The fish is my go to and I get the number 2 off the specialty menu with fish.

We decided to stop in at Cabo Bob s on our way from Houston to Fredericksburg  as it was right off the highway and the reviews were great   I have to say  overall  it was different but I would not say it was  better than Freebird   it was just different than Freebird.  I ordered the tacos with the chile tortilla.  They heat the tortillas to be super crispy which is cool and again  lends to this being different from the other places.  I got the fish and 2 chicken tacos.  While I hate fried food  I did think the fish was the bomb  especially loaded up with all the extras including the really hot sauce.   I would definitely stop here again if in the area.

GREAT burritos and excellent service by Angie and the rest of the friendly staff. I ordered the  4 fish burrito and the  2 deluxe fish tacos and it was HUGE. The burrito came with 6 crispy pieces of fish  awesome pico-de-gallo and tasty hot sauce. It s hard to find a good burrito in Texas  because everyone just makes tacos. I m happy I found Cabo Bob s. I ll definitely be back again and again.

Come here often. Last time our to-go food was really bad and then decided to give them another chance. Just waited for 30 minutes in a not even long line and when I went to check out I mentioned to the manager that our experience was poor last time and he gave zero shits. Just awful customer service.

Wow  what a bad experience from a place my family and I loved  I ordered food to go for my family and I and when I get home with the food after a 30 min drive there and back i open the bag and the order is all wrong  my tacos made incorrectly  queso and chips missing  sauces not added  the tacos looked like some one stepped on them  and just the simple things  like putting orders in individual bags so you don t have to open every taco to see which is yours and which is your family s  after talking to a manager  she just said that if I wanted to drive there and back I can pick up the missing items  or she could refund the queso and chips  she really sounded careless and indifferent about the situation  the sad thing is that this wasn t my first messed up to go  I told the manager that  I m trying to support local restaurants during this pandemic  but some make it really hard to do so.

this place has been a regular spot for years  their fish burrito is my  F A V E .  and they are like 85  consistent - the other 15  is when i ve gotten not-so-fresh-tasting fish  and the one time i didn t get any mango pico   BUT they are always solid in accommodating   making up for it when it s bad enough that i have to say something  rare . and stuff like that usually happens when i accidentally go during lunch rush - i try not to  they get SLAMMED - so i m never mad about it. they keep me coming back though  especially the chips  which have been stale maybe once in 6 years. i always order ahead now  and curbside is easy. i knocked off a star for the one person working without a mask  in stage 5    . and special shoutout to Daniel doing the to-go orders last time - for reminding me about my punch card  and also selecting theee best brownie... how did you know i love corner pieces

This place puts Freebirds and Chipotle to shame. The tortillas are freshly made right in front of you. I usually make my own  Buttermilk Flour Tortilla  Steak  Chipotle Crema  Cilantro Lime Rice  Black Beans  Shredded Cheese  Guacamole  and Lime Juice  and it s consistently great.  Going to keep going every time I visit Austin to see if I can make a better burrito. Come give it a try

My favorite Burrito place. If you haven t been here yet you re missing out   Everything on the menu tastes great and I mean e v e r y t h i n g    My favorite to get is the pork. My son loves to top his with lime juice. Veggies are grilled perfectly. Tortillas are freshly made in front of you. My mouth salivates thinking about their food.

Absolutely love this place   Burrito s as big as your head   Fresh ingredients and tortillas made on the spot.  The ambiance reminds me of costal Baja Mexico.  Staff was friendly and service was fairly fast.  When we arrived the line was out the door and we were eating in less than 15 minutes.

I m am so glad Bob decided to bring his culinary burrito talents from Cabo to Austin  Tortilla  exquisite. Meat  amazing. Sauces  varied. Queso  delicious. Toppings  oh so many   This place is so gosh darn good. Get a burrito now

This is one of my favorite fish taco stops in Austin  The fish is fried and the chunks are decent size. We had ordered the Deluxe Fish Tacos. The order includes three tacos which are unique. For example  the tortillas are cilantro tomatillo tortilla  the second is an anch chilli and the third is a buttermilk tortilla. The filler ingredients are chipotle crema  pico-de-gallo with mango  guacamole  cheese  finely shredded cabbage  lime and fresh crispy fried fish. The deluxe fish was my ultimate favorite. You can taste all the various ingredients from the crispy fired fish  avocado  cheese the smooth cream  tangy lime and spicy chipotle with a little crunch from the cabbage and finally the unique tortillas. Overall  a really delicious food and the service was fast and friendly. If you are looking for a quick  casual  tasty meal  this is a good stop.
So glad I finally tried this place  Better than chipotle and free birds  It s soooo good and can t even believe I out off trying them for so long. I just wish they were open on sundays.

Not the best tacos I have ever had  but pretty good  and very generous portions  probably the biggest tacos I have ever had.   The menu was a bit confusing but the employees were all very friendly and helpful. You can mix and match the taco plate. Comes with 3 tacos. I got the deluxe fish  the brisket and queso and the Bobs chicken. The deluxe fish was my ultimate favorite. The brisket and queso was pretty yummy. Meh on the bobs chicken. We also got a side of chips  queso and guac. The queso was really good but the guac tasted processed and not very fresh.   It was very busy on 2 00 on a Friday  there wasn t any inside seating. Clearly a popular place.  The parking lot is a mess  getting in wasn t hard but it took forever to escape.   I don t live in the area and I don t know if this would be at the top of my list to stop at when I m back in town  but if you are in the area and want decent tacos  huge portions  at a pretty fair price  and friendly service come here.

food is great  lady at the front Theresa was openly very rude to me and several employees in the five minutes i was there. not to mention the only one not wearing a mask. i will not be returning to this location.

Yum   Came to Austin for the week and this place was on my list of things to try. I was pleasantly surprised with the burritos  It was really tasty and the queso is delicious too. I will be back forsure
Delicious food and the prices are definitely desirable. Friendly staff and will definitely be back

On a road trip from Ontario  Canada to the West Coast  and stopped here to get some  fuel for the journey . Wow  The kids and I were all impressed  Fresh  quality ingredients  Great drink options too  We would come back again  if in the area... 5 stars all the way      Lots of easy  free parking too

Cabo Bob s is just plain ol  good  consistently fast food. For burritos  tacos and bowls  I find them way better than Chipotle or those other order-down-the-line  I made that up   chains. The tortillas are fresh. Like  made right in front of yo  face fresh...and there are several interesting tortilla flavors  think ancho chili or something tomatillo  and lots of toppings to choose from. Their queso is good. Their chips are great. Each order is way more food than I can ever eat  so I never leave still hungry. Parking is ample and prices are right. The only reason Bob didn t get five stars is because every time I come for lunch they are PACKED  and there aren t enough tables  especially in summer when it s too hot for the patio. Maybe they can knock out the store next door and double their size

So i had no expectations of this place when seeing it on Yelp  the stars are  stars   but wow this place is LEGIT   Visiting from FL  all we have is Chipotle  Moe s SW Grille  Baja Burrito  Tijuana Flats  etc   but this place rises above from all of them.   The choices of type of tortilla you get is amazing  not just  corn  or  flour   but actual flavors infused into the soft-shell tortilla itself  and the way it s made is awesome as can be. - the mango salsa is to die for. - the  beef  meat is actually large chunks of steak  yum   - the place it pretty big and can house plenty of people. - the workers there seem to love their job and actually enjoy being there.   When it comes to burritos  nothing in FL can really top this place in terms of size  choice and quality. One of the best things about Austin is actually coming here to eat the food since it s that good.  While I m not a local of Austin  TX  based out of Orlando  FL  this place certainly gives other taco burrito places a run for it s money when it comes to price  efficiency and the quality of food that is served.
I love Cabo bobs  It s like a high class chipotle or free birds lol. Seriously though  the food seems fresh  and taste really good
Great place to eat lots of food for the money clean and friendly bartenders  That make you feel at home thank you will come back to visit again
These burritos are amazing. Line is usually long during lunch but its totally worth the wait.

The best burritos in the world  The size of the burritos makes 2 full meals. I love getting their fish  6 pieces most of the time. The mango pico is TDF. Their customer loyalty punch card  after 6 punches you get a free burrito or free tshirt. I have 3 shirts  they re my favorites. I also got 1 for my mom and still have gotten a couple free burritos.

I don t write reviews often but Cabo deserves it. My go to spot. I d say I eat here about 2 times a week. Once you go Cabo you can t go back. Bye bye chip  le and fr  birds. Better meat  better queso  better beans  better veggies. They ve even got better sauces. The workers are beyond awesome at this location. They always give great customer service.   Pro tip   get the bowl and a tortilla on the side. Best bang for your buck

My cousin and I had flown to Austin to pick a car  before getting on the road to head back to Dallas we decided to stop for lunch. We were VERY impressed with the food. The establishment was crowded but the line moved quickly. I know you re able to pick different flavor tortillas which we did but they all tasted the same to us. There are a log of different sauces you can try. The next time I m in Austin I ll stop there

Freshly made tortillas will always have my heart. The cilantro tortillas are especially fitting for your fish tacos  It is a make your own bar  think Chipotle or Qdoba but much more delicious. I think I have found a new lunch spot when I am craving Mexican. Additionally the staff were SO nice and attentive  making the overall experience amazing.
Horrible.... 9 for this little bit of food. Little bit of lettuce and a table spoon of chicken with avocado.  Cost me  9 cost them .85 cents....worse customer service ever...

After moving 100s of miles away from Austin 2 years ago  I find myself daydreaming about Cabo Bobs fish tacos. I want one so bad right now. If that s not a sign of how good they are  I don t know what is.

Well I finally made it to Cabo Bobs   I was absolutely surprised with the quality of food.  I was kind of expecting freebirds I guess but a little different.  My cousin was in town and mentioned he wanted fish tacos  so Steve H. looked up the top places to get fish tacos in Austin on what else but the yelp app ... and the  1 place was too far so we opted for  2 which was Cabo Bobs.    I ordered the  1 fish tacos on a smoked cheddar tortilla.  There was a mango pico de gallo and a creamy chipotle sauce with 2 huge chunks of golden fried fish  cabbage and a lime on the side.  I squeezed the lime juice on each taco and as I ate them the mango pico  creamy sauce and lime juice mixed around on the fish and tortilla ... mmm it totally hit the spot.  The chips and salsa were good too   And they have all the Dublin real cane sugar drinks on fountain ... my favorite is the red cream soda    All in all our whole table was pleased and loved their lunch.  I am glad I finally tried Cabo Bobs.  I will absolutely hit this place up again   I think it is better than Freebirds and Chipotle.

Visiting Austin for one day and stumbled on this place on yelp.  Very fresh food with freshly made tortillas of different variety in front of your eyes.  Food is served in bowl or burrito  taco style with different fillings.  Fish and chicken filling were really good.  Fountain and bottle drinks.  Lots of sittings and good parking space.  Lots of university students but families here too.  Lively and clean spot with long line but fast.

I got the Bob s Chicken Bowl and it was pretty tasty but I have to admit that it wasn t quite as flavorful as Chipotle to me. However  I m sure I m the minority but it was way better than Freebirds. I would like to try it again and order something else because it s possible I just didn t get the right thing.

I cannot say enough good things about Cabo Bob s.  They have delicious  home made flour tortillas that are authentic.  Their ingredients are always fresh and their jalapeno salsa is to die for   Their customer service is consistently solid and the line generally moves pretty fast.  This is my go-to place for burrito bowls tacos.  The steak fajita is so flavorful and tender.  Cabo Bob s is one of my favorite Austin gems.
When stopping in Austin this is a must. I drive to Austin twice a month for business and I stop here every time. Need some in Dallas soon

First time experience was more than fantastic  Food was made to perfection  understatement . Management approached us to check in and to give us a quick overview of its history and it s food preparation. Very satisfied

This place hands down rolls over Freebirds and Chipotle   I get the beef or chicken  and the fact that they have multi colored flavored options for your tortilla is just sweet.. The prices are comparable to Chipotle s but they have soooo many more options to put on your burro pile of food. I eat a lot and half of a giant burro is more than enough to satiate your appetite   The cups they give away are pretty sweet as well  the graphics . Very nice place to hang out indoors or out  sport bar vibey.  Definitively check it out while in ATX
First time trying this place  got their Veggie burrito on the cilantro tomatillo tortilla and it was delicious  No salsa required  packed with flavor. I ll definitely be back for more.
It was okay  wish the meat had a little more flavor. It just felt like a less tasty version of chipotle.
Service is good and efficient. Love their fish tacos  Highly recommend  they have bowls  tacos  burritos and fresh homemade tortillas.

not kidding this is the BEST TEX MEX in austin. I go to school in fort worth but come here the second i get into town. erasmo knows me and my sister by name and even knows our orders- everyone here is extremely friendly and the food is insanely good. the line goes by fast  great vibes inside  and make sure to get the queso and guacamole   also their chicken slaps.

CABO BOB S IS THE BOMB   Hands down  best burrito place in Austin...Makes competitors like Chipotle  Qdoba  and Freebirds look like a joke.  You can get burritos  tacos  or salad bowl and even give you selection of different types of tortillas. The tortillas are made fresh right in front of you and they cook all their meats on Big Green Egg grills. They also have queso  salsas  and their own house made hot sauce.  They also do punch-cards so you can get a free burrito after 6 visits. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Cabo Bob s is SO good. As a first timer to this place I wasn t sure what to expect but was very impressed. I would compare it to Chipotle  but that doesn t even do it justice. The tortillas are made right in front of you and the ingredients have a lot of variety and look very fresh. The mint sweet tea was AMAZING. Would recommend

This place cuts corners close to close and makes it s called in orders priority.   Went in tonight and waited thirty minutes for a softball sized burrito with crusty ass carnitas. I requested to add fresh queso to it but they just got done scraping the bottom of their 1 6 pan so they were all out.  For the love of god learn how to cook rice. You re a burrito joint.  I wondered why I stopped going here. Now I know.

Got a fish bowl and a beef bowl to go. Around  7- 8 each  good amount    Similar concepts as Chipotle  you pick your meet  vege and as many toppings as you want. And the freshness of the food here is better in my opinion.  The red hot sauce have a strong smoky BBQ favor.  Tons of parking.

You know how places get too over hyped and it sometimes makes you not want to go because you feel like you might be disappointed   Well it happens to me.   My brother and his friends got some burritos last time and my brother gave me a bite of his. With just that one bite I was sold. Since then I ve been going constantly. It s actually a little embarrassing lol.   Why is this place better than Chipotle   Their tortillas are seasoned and flavored  Yeah I know Freebirds has different kinds of tortillas but come on Cabo does them better. They have your regular buttermilk  ancho chili  cheddar  and cilantro. I always go for the ancho chili tortilla to spice things further. Another thing I love about Cabo is the big selection of sauces    They have Red salsa  hot tomatillo sauce  ancho chili sauce  Chipotle crema and some other ones I have yet to try  I feel like the sauces are what makes the burrito taste even more awesome. I mean come on who wants a plain dry burrito    If you hate crowds like I do then you should definitely order online  It s surprisingly quicker than I had expected considering the big lines they sometimes get. I haven t dine in yet so I can t speak about customer service in depth but everytime I go to pick up my food  someone is always there to help me right away despite the line of people ordering to my right. One of the managers  Erasmo  is very kind and friendly. If there s ever a problem he tries to do right by the customer to fix their orders.  I definitely recommend this place to everyone. Stop going to Chipotle and go to Cabo Bob s instead. Plus they have a  buy 6 burritos and get a free shirt  stamp card

I m heaping another good review on the pile.   Wife had three tacos and declared the Fish Tacos to be the best option of the three.   I went with a surprisingly moist brisket burrito. Enjoyed every bite. Don t let the size fool you  it s about the same amount of food you get at Freebirds but it s not tightly packed and rolled like FB prefers to do.   Fresh tortillas make this a really different choice over other fast casual burrito and taco places.   I don t come to Austin often but I d eat here again.

This was a great stop for dinner on a road trip.  I ve not been to place like this that does fish in their burritos or tacos  so this was a welcome change.  You get 4 different types of tortillas  though I don t think they have any corn options.  They are all very tasty though.  You can pick your choice of meats along with all the sides and toppings you want.  I ended up with a pretty monstrous burrito that filled me up.  If you order tacos  you get 3 of them in pretty big portions as well.  Their choice of sides is decent and they have lots of sauces to choose from.  I m not sure exactly why  but we were comped some chips and queso and also managed to get a few extra tortillas to try out.  The place works quickly  are friendly  and relatively inexpensive for what you get.  Even though the fish was decent  next time  I d try some other options just to see how they turn out.
It was fast and easy  not a long line. I got the fish tacos and they were delicious  A great local chain  definitely a go-to place for easy eats

Definitely prefer this place over chipotle on the next street on stassney. The chicken here is always juicy and can t  forget the shredded pork is also very good. Plus always have nice staff and clean patio.

Cabo bobs is pretty good. Their system for ordering and picking up during covid is easy and efficient. I like the fish in the burrito and the options for other fillings. I really like their xx hot sauce and always ask for extra.

Lately I am almost always disappointed when eating out  however we picked up some Cabo Bob s today and it was fabulous. I got the Baja Tacos. It was fresh and the portion was substantial and the price reasonable. Reminds me of San Diego food. The fish did not taste fishy and the chips didn t taste like old oil  like you find at so many places. My partner had a burrito and it was amazing also. Great Job Bob

I m not a huge fan of big burrito s. I think I have an intense hatred of Freebirds. That being said Cabo Bobs had such a high yelp rating for so long that I felt I had to give it a try. It being so close to work made it convenient to do so.  So I was going to get a salad or some sorta bowl option which is what I always do when I have to eat at some place like this but when I got in the line which seemed to be moving very fast and efficiently I couldn t help but notice they were making the tortillas for the burritos right away and then using them. This looks like it could turn out to be better than your average sticky lowest common form a bread tortilla so I decided to go with the Pork Burrito.   I selected some sort of cheese flavored tortilla.. and started going through the line. I got rice  beans  guacamole  onions and all the fixings. They made the biggest burrito for me I have ever seen.   I got back to work and settled in to eat it .. now the tortilla was sticky and gross I ll probably not get tricked into trying the burrito again. The pork was very tasty and the price and speed of service was awesome.   Also the cane sugar soda selection is unmatched. I got cane sugar big peach and it was amazing. I think I would have enjoyed my food more if I would have just gotten the salad. I also cant wait to try the Baja Fish Taco s.   I says give these guys a chance its good food

The disappointment from my online order. I ordered the Baja fish tacos with extra cheese and extra mango pico  the tacos come with it but we love it so we get extra. The taco had no cheese  that I paid for and the tacos had no chipotle sauce on them  very dry. They did give me some on the side but that in my opinion is the extra I requested. My Bf and I love the fish tacos but it appears the order is only correct when we order in person. We live in SM and make the drive just for Cabo bobs. I disappoint myself every time I order online. This isn t the first time. It s been like a hand full of times in the last 5 years we ve been ordering. It s always missing something I ve requested  but with the extra hot sauce and queso we get  it s still good and we continue to order here. It would be nice if the person who reads the order could kindly make it as requested. The food is good but i shouldn t have to walk the line just to make sure it s the way I want it. I would have to recommend eating there to truly enjoy it.
This place makes the best burrito I ve ever had. I will never eat at chipotle  freebirds  or Qdoba ever again

This was the first place I choose to dine at my first time in Texas for some Tex-Mex.  Prior to eating here I ve always heard   tacos are better in Texas...   from so many people. I never thought tacos could get any better than what I ve had in California or even from certain places in Florida. But boy  was I highly mistaken.  This place has ruined any taco I will eat from here on out. I can t even eat Chipotle anymore  because I realized it s straight garbage.  The moment I saw the dining attendant hand press the tortilla I knew it was game over. They even had different flavors of tortillas  The brisket and the pulled pork tacos were awesome  I even ordered crispy fish nachos to split and my friend ordered an over stuffed burrito.   Well it s true what they say-everything is bigger in Texas indeed. We only got through 1 4 of the nachos and I could only make my way through 2 out of three tacos. They were stuffed to the brim.   All in all I would definitely pay a visit back to this establishment if I m in the area. Great value and awesome food

Amazing burritos and burrito bowls  I loved the ancho Chile tortilla  cilantro was okay but not bad. They make this hot tortilla in front of you and add the burrito ingredients as you like. We tried veggie burrito from the menu which was little dry for us  but once we added sauce and sour cream it was awesome  I also tried their veggie bowl so much tastier than chipotle   Totally recommend my vegetarian and vegan friends to visit this place

Frreesssh tortillas  smashed and toasted in front of your eyes.  There s just something that makes me giddy with anticipation when I see the balls of dough mashed the the giant press and then toss on the revolving hot plate.  I love how fresh everything tastes here - although I always go back to the fish tacos.  They re just smashingly good.  Definitely use the hot sauces too - tasty and well worth it  extra spicy does actually have a little kick  .  If you want sodas - it s all pure cane sugar rush for you.

Holy burrito Batman  I had the  4 fish burrito on the cilantro tomatillo tortilla and it could have easily fed 3 people. This is the kinda food that you just can t stop eating because it s so good. I added white rice  black beans  onions  green peppers  they put on 5 pieces of fried fish  salsa  cheese and sour cream. I m drooling just thinking back to it again. Definitely worth waiting in line and worth the money for such a big portion. It s like Chipotle or Qdoba  but better

This place is awesome. Their food is top notch and they have been extremely efficient in implementing a takeout system. Easily one of my favorite restaurants and I hope to continue eating here for years.

I ordered some nachos with steak  queso and whole  pinto beans. The steak was so so kinda chewy. Queso was runny and not thick. The beans had no salt. I didn t care for the ancho hot sauce. The best thing was the thickness of the nacho chip. It held up with all the toppings and did not get soggy. For the price you can t beat it. It s also filling and I didn t try all of the other options that were available for toppings but it s a good mixture of items. I will go again and try the burrito. The tortillas looked yummy and huge

Similar to the likes of Chipotle and Freebird s  Cabo Bob s is a build your own burrito style restaurant.  I found this location during a recent trip to Austin and am glad I did. While you can always build your own burrito  you can also choose from a menu of 5-6 burritos to choose from. I tried my burrito on a smoked cheddar tortilla and it was a perfect compliment to the rest of my meal. We also had chips and queso on the side of our burritos  which was delicious  The atmosphere is very chill and a great place for a quick lunch or casual dinner. The staff making our burritos were all business - they hardly had time for niceties as it was lunch time and very busy on the day we went.   Definitely going back to visit.

Found this place on a whim when I had an hour to kill before meeting up with some friends. I grabbed a quick bite here and was pleasantly surprised. With the influx of Chipotle clones  Cabo Bobs stands out.  The fresh tortillas is what sets them apart--ever so slightly crispy and delightful. I had the fried fish tacos. To be honest  the fish wasn t that great but as a whole taco unit thing  everything was great.  Oh  do yourself a favor and try the hot sauce. It has a nice smokey flavor and a decent kick.

This is a Chipotle concept but so much better.  The tortilla was freshly pressed for my burrito as I placed my order and the ingredients used to assemble it appear to be much more fresh.  The line does get a bit long and it is overwhelming making so many choices  but that adds to the uniqueness of creating whatever your taste buds are feeling at the time.  The pricing for the portions is spot on and a great place to grab a quick lunch or dinner.
It s pretty good  fresh and varieties in flavors . This is like the higher end of Chipotle lol

Tacos were good  but definitely nothing to write home about. It s a cool atmosphere but still feels like a chain. If you re in Austin there are a ton of places to get tacos  so I d prefer a hole in the wall over this type of establishment. Still decent tho.

I am always beyond impressed with the freshness of the food  cleanliness of the restaurant  and friendliness of the staff.   Today however I wanted to focus on a specific individual. I just happened to be in there just the other week and forgot to make this review.   A group of hearing impaired persons were in line in front of me and I was beyond impressed with the way Robert took care of them. Not only was he signing with them  which I am sure they appreciated greatly   but he also took the time to slow things down a bit so that they didnt feel rushed moving through the line. To me  the level of service Robert provided was nothing short of stellar and I am hoping that one of his managers takes the time to read this to him.   Thank you Robert for all you do. And thank you to the entire staff for not only making a group feel great about being in your house  but for having that same great attitude every time I walk through that door too. Keep up the good food and good work

We wasted 30 minutes in line tonight behind 5 or so other parties. We had to leave seeing that we were still 10-20 minutes from getting food. The issue seems to be that to-go orders take precedence over people in line.  Until they learn to balance to-go and in-house customers I won t be back  which is disappointing considering the food has been great in the past.

I m currently eating vegan and I was pleasantly surprised that they advertise a vegan burrito  It was delicious   Their homemade tortilla chips were so good too  When I m feeling like cheating with fish   this is the place I ll go. The fried fish looked awesome  Everyone s burritos were HUGE too. Great price for the quality and quantity

Cabo Bob s is a casual Chipotle-like burrito joint. It was a nice place to enjoy a casual weeknight dinner. - Ambiance  The inside has a casual  surfer feel with a counter for ordering. It was clean and spacious. Even though the restaurant was fairly crowded  it was easy to find a place to sit. - Service  The counter ordering was not as fast as I expected  but I appreciated that each person was willing to accommodate special requests and answer any questions about the food. - Food Drinks  I made my own bowl with chicken  brown rice  and black beans with a variety of toppings. The tortillas are cooked fresh to order. They happily accommodate my request to have a cilantro tomatillo tortilla on the side. All the food was fresh and delicious. I much preferred it to any other burrito chains. They served a variety of bottled and fountain drinks. Only complaint is the only non-diet darker soda tasted like it was not working properly so we had to grab a diet Coke instead. - Value  The food is high quality and delicious and the portions are large. I had enough leftover for a meal the following day

Amazing meal overall  I recommend the Smokey cheddar burrito but truly everything is amazing and tastes fresh  Honestly  would definitely recommend overall chipotle and freebirds.  The price point is perfect and an amazing lunch or dinner deal with the perfect amount of food.
A nice alternative to chipotle or freebirds  The line is always super long around lunchtime  so you know other people are a fan too.

Seriously  I don t know why anyone goes to chipotle  qdoba  or any of those fakers when you have Cabo bobs. It simply smashes all of them. They make your tortilla fresh and to order   You can choose from a multitude of flavors or even combine some. They put it on the press as dough and 1min later  you have a hot fresh flour tortilla. Love their toppings as well  do yourself a favor and get the fish   queso drizzled on top. If you re a real pro  you get the tacos instead of the burrito. Tacos come out to be larger and you get to try multiple fillings. Would stay away from the nachos though  not worth it compared to the burrito taco.
Love their food. Some of my favorite fast food. The fact they do the tortillas on order and the meat is cooked by the egg sets them apart from everyone   Congrats on excellence and continuing to grow
Cabo Bob is great  Casual environment  great food with nice portion  amp  friendly people

We had Cabo Bob s in catering form and it was delicious. Everything fresh and really tasty. I made a bowl with beans  chicken  all the sauces  guac  and a little queso. I would highly recommend this if you have a Tex-Mex craving  but want to keep it fresh. I will certainly be going back   Big thumbs up  thanks for the delicious food

If you haven t been to CABO BOBS run there  NOW  except if it s Sunday because they re closed that day   It s like Chipotle but SO MUCH better  and doesn t even come close   First of all they make their own tortillas  Smokey Cheddar  Ancho Chile  and more  From there you ll pick your protein  fajita chicken steak  brisket  fried fish  a variety of beans  sauce  mango and regular pico  queso  guac  rice and much more   They offer tacos  burritos  bowls  salads  and nachos  build your own or select from their menu   My go-to is the 4 tacos on Smokey cheddar  white rice  fried fish  onions  cheese  sour cream  mango pico  and chipotle crema  if I m really hungry I ll get chips and queso too  Cabo Bobs is THE BEST

I m out of town and decided I wanted a taco of sorts  so of course I checked Yelp first and found Cabo Bob s. The setup reminds me of Chipotle  in that you select your burrito  salad or bowl choice  and then decide what you want to load it with  with the options presented before you . This place is like a cross between Chipotle and Torchy s  however the food tastes more like Chipotle... If there s a connection  I m not aware of it. The food wasn t great and wasn t bad  it was just ok. I was excited to check it out because the reviews were awesome. ...Meh.

I don t know how to describe these burritos in words. Delicious  incredible  amazing  Still not enough. If you ever find yourself in Austin hungry  please do not go anywhere but Cabo Bob s. They start making the burritos with your choice of tortilla  including cilantro tomatillo  ancho chile  and other flavors. They fill each burrito with your choice of rice  beans  meat  grilled chicken is my favorite   grilled veggies  don t say no  they re free   salsas  and the typical fixings. Some of my personal favorites are the fresh lime juice  and the hot tomatillo salsa. If you don t like spicy food  then you are missing out  sadly. Their hot sauces are INCREDIBLE. I cannot get enough of their XXtra Hot. The line at this place tends to get quite long around peak hours  so come hungry  but come prepared to wait. There is plenty of parking at this location  it is just a little hard to get here when you re coming off the exit from I-35. The right turn by the Chick-Fil-A is easy to miss...I know because I ve done it almost every time. Prices are very reasonable here  about  7-9 for a burrito  prices vary based upon meat selection . I wish I had pictures  but I always end up forgetting because I start to chow down. When I go again  I will try to remember to take some.   Bottom Line  Low key fast casual   Chipotle-style   burrito joint with high quality  flavorful  reasonably priced food. Pro-tip  do not get a bowl  they re just not as good. HIGHLY recommend

Great staff and atmosphere  They are always very patient  helpful and friendly each time I go. After trying multiple things on the menu  my decided favorite is a brisket salad loaded with everything from sauteed veggies to guacamole. Yummy  Keep up the good work Cabo Bob s and make sure to take care of that incredible staff you have

I always notice this place when I go to Chick-fil-A and figured it was just another Taco Cabana type of restaurant.  So glad it popped up on Yelp when I searched  burritos  with a 4.5 star review  reinforcing the fact that I shouldn t judge a book by its cover    When I noticed the big green eggs  I knew we were going to have some good food.  I had a steak fajita burrito in a cilantro tomatillo tortilla  and my boyfriend had 3 tacos with various meats.  He felt that the tacos weren t enough food  but he s a pretty big eater.  My burrito was fabulous and I was truly impressed how juicy and tender the steak was   The burrito stayed together well  and I was only able to finish half of it before I was full.  It stayed intact enough for me to wrap it up in some foil and take it home.  I also tried the ancho rancho and chipotle crema sauces.  They were both super yummy  but I prefer the chipotle crema.  The prices are unbeatable and this place  while similar to Chipotle  is WAY better than Chipotle.  Definitely going to be a new fast food staple in our household.

This Cabo s location is always good except tonight. I placed an online order for pickup at 8 00pm at around 7 15pm. Got there right at 8 food was barely warm which isn t too bad I mean using a microwave isn t the end of the world but when I paid extra for queso on my burrito but no queso... kind of dry..... Also my wife s bowl didn t have any guac which we paid extra for as well. Make sure your order is correct before you leave or you may end up paying extra for nothing but I prefer this location over others.  Update  The Manager did contact me and offered to replace my meal which was not my intentions  I love Cabo bobs and I think it s wonderful that he reached out  That is customer service at its best  Even though I probably won t redeem it because that s not why I wrote this. But major props for the General Manager

Guys  Why in the world would anyone go to Chipotle when we have this gem amongst us   The tortillas like all the other ingredients are FRESH  Homemade tortillas is what really sets Cabo Bob s apart from all the other burrito places  flavorful meats and great salsas combine forces to kick your tastebuds into high gear. They have a great selection of drinks and since they aren t sell outs you won t see any Pepsi Coca Cola brands here  just good ol cane sugar sweetened drinks. Oh and they have the good ice too... you ll think of me when you try it.

This place is one of my go to places for lunch. The service is fast and the tortillas are fresh  The fish tastes amazing and has a nice crunch. It s usually packed around lunch time so if you need to get in and out fast I suggest you come before 12. It s usually pretty quick though so if there is a line don t let it deter you. The fresh brewed tea is also on point.

11 30am Called today to try to see how long the wait was because my office has never been to this restaurant. Lady on the phone said she was too busy to bother talking to me and she let me go. Obviously they don t need any more new business at this restaurant. We will never be showing up here ever.  12 45pm Ok  update. The manager of the restaurant contacted me and assured me that is not the normal service they expect from their employees. So I m gonna give it a try next week.
Better than chipotle  Great meats and the pick your own tortilla flavor is awesome.  Ask for samples to try the meats out before you build  they re all delicious.  Cute environment

Cabo Bob s is my personal temple   The fresh tortillas are bomb  my fave is cilantro and ancho chile mixed   the ingredients are fresh and tasty.  Best vegan burrito I ve ever had  Get it with jalapenos  mango pico and extra guacamole.

Chipotle who  Freebirds what    This place is the bomb diggity. We rocked up at 8 55 and the place closed at 9. I know  we were THOSE people  and I did feel really bad about it. But we were starving  so we decided to order as quickly as possible and make it as easy as possible on the employees who wanted to leave so bad.   I fully expected them to be disgruntled that we walked in so close to closing time  who wouldn t be    but they were all smiling and excited to help us out on our first time    Bae got a brisket burrito on an ancho chile tortilla and I opted for chicken on cilantro tomatillo.  I usually ALWAYS get burrito bowls because I don t even like tortillas but I saw that they were making them fresh so I HAD to get one  Umm...I am still excited about making this decision. It was DELICIOUS and FRESH and ok  on to the next part.   Employees were awesome. They even hooked it up with Chips and Queso ON THE HOUSE because they felt bad we were leaving to eat elsewhere as they were closing up...we just went and ate on the benches outside.  Nothing about this place that isnt friendly  delicious  and awesome. 7 5

Same concept as Chipotle  but Cabo Bob s queso is much better.  Bob s cilantro lime rice is much better too.  You have four choices of tortillas here- all pressed and cooked in front of you.  The wait is long  so order ahead if possible.

I ve been on the hunt for some good Baja fish tacos - fried  please  I ve got no love for grilled fish in a taco   amp  most of what I see on menus is grilled. These were good with a crisp cornmeal batter. Fresh cabbage  amp  crema. I had some of the mango pico added. Simple  amp  the price is right.

More options than competitors Freebirds and Chipotle. Their buy six get one free punch card is a bargain if you go there with any regularity.  I like the cheddar tortilla with steak fajita.  The employees are always friendly considering how slammed this place always is. Be prepared to stand in line unless you order online ahead of time.

First of all  yes  getting in and out of the Walmart Parking lot can be tough  but that s not the point  this is a Burrito stop and totally worth making the trip to. The food is Really tasty and delicious  The fresh tortillas made right in front of you are hard to resist. The rest of the meat  fish and veggie options are delicious too. Also  they don t skimp you in portions and are guaranteed to get a Heaping Burrito  Better be hungry   And Ask for a cup of Salsa Verde on the side and your set

I am trying to get over my crushed expectations in order to provide an objective review of my visit to Cabos Bob s.  I had high hopes for some authentic fish tacos and with such high praise on Yelp  I decided to make a run.  You can imagine my disappointment as I pulled into a newer shopping mall and found Cabos Bobs sitting behind a Starbucks - this is just your regular  run-of-the-mill Americanized and corporatized Mexican food.    Now - if that is what you are in the mood for - I don t want to discourage you from giving Bob a try.  I had a solid experience from the moment I walked in.  The seating area was clean  the workers friendly and helpful. The hot food was hot and the cold food was cold.    I ordered the taco trio and got to work trying to sample as much of the menu as I possibly could in one basket.  You have a choice of four soft shells - I chose the three flavored ones.  There is a choice of chicken  fish  beef  pork  and steak - I chose fish  beef  and pork.  All of the usual toppings round out the offerings.  All of the food was well-prepared if just a bit bland for what I was expecting.  An unexpected highlight of the trip was the cane sugar sodas that are available on the fountain - strong  vibrant flavors like ginger ale  root beer  vanilla cr me  and cola.  The cola was particularly amazing - give it a try and you will realize how bad Coke and Pepsi taste as they have become mere commodities trying to drive price out of their recipes.  The Mint Sweet Tea was also unexpectedly good.    You won t go wrong with Cabo Bob s  but it is also not an  experience

The  7 Best Beef Burrito is actually the best    The burrito was very filling and tasty. In addition  the beef was very tender and perfectly seasoned. They actually had really unique ingredients that I haven t seen before at burrito restaurants such as their smokey cheddar tortilla. This place might actually be better than Chipotle or Freebirds. I am already excited for my next visit

Crispy fish tacos  Xxtra hot sauce is not too hot  but very tasty   Cayenne hot  guacamole  mango salsa  and tortillas are cooked perfectly and each has a unique flavor. If you want really big  really good tacos and burritos  this is the place   D

Can I just eat here all the time please ... I got a chicken taco with poblano  cilantro and sour cream on corn tortilla - plus some chips and guacamole. Mmmmmm.  Making the Homer Simpson face with drool

3 words. Smoked Cheddar Burrito  Simply the best and most fresh ingredients your heart could desire all wrapped up in your choice of home made tortillas. I personally love the smoked cheddar burrito because of the subtle undertones that compliment my veggies and fillings. The staff are helpful and are generous in toppings. I usually get all 3 of the beans and add grilled veggies with there many sauces. The burritos are huge and I often take it home for left overs. Sooooo good. You gotta try it
It was really good  staff was efficient and friendly. I loved the mango salsa  it s the only thing that really sets them apart from Freebirds and Chipotle. which is a whole other review... lol

Love their tortillas. They press the dough and cook it in front of you. I love that you can build your own taco or burrito  and it comes with three tacos  so you can try chicken  brisket and pork on each tacos. So delicious. And so much food  Portions are huge.  I hope they have it plans to expand to North Austin

First time coming here  and it was pretty great to say the least  The line moved at a fair pace and i enjoyed the options for the burrito bowl. the employees were a little stale but the burrito made up for it  Will be coming back if i visit austin again

Food was excellent  Customer service was lacking. It s great to give food fast  but when a new customer comes through the line and doesn t know how things run  please give them some friendly guidance. A reassuring smile goes a long way.

Wow  this place is good   I ve been remiss in not mentioning how much I like this place after having had a couple of meals here a month or two ago.  Some of the most flavorful burritos and tacos I ve had in this state  almost enough to give Torchy s a run for their money.  If there s any nitpicks I have  it s that a  the different flavored tortillas are more a gimmick than anything else as they don t alter the flavor much if at all  and b  it s CROWDED in here during lunch  but that s evidence that they know how to make good food.  This place gets a 4  CTJ Scale  as noted below.  5 out of 5 stars  Come-to-Jesus good. Would be OK passing on after finishing a plate here. 4 out of 5 stars  Come-to-Mary good. Would be OK being seen eating here by Mother Mary. 3 out of 5 stars  Come-to-Joseph good. Would be OK having a beer here with Jesus  Dad. 2 out of 5 stars  Come-to-the-Apostles good. Meh. Wouldn t have my last supper here. 1 out of 5 stars  Come-to-Nobody good. I wouldn t have my penultimate supper here  either.

Ehhh... This place was just okay. I was going to go to Freebirds  but according to other yelpers  Cabo Bob s is so much better so I took their advice and came here. When I showed up just before noon  the line was super long  but the employees were very efficient. The line moved quickly. I was impressed to see that they make their tortillas in house and they press them when you order.   I got a chicken burrito bowl. The ingredients were fresh but bland. The guacamole is just crushed avocados-no tomatoes  onions  cilantro or spices added. I love burritos and was excited to try something we don t have back home  but I think I ll stick with my tried and true Chipotle.

Y all  I just have to say  this place never disappoints  With all the bad reviews that flood the internet  I just thought I would put a GOOD one up.  From their flavors  to their great prices  to their awesome chips  they won t break when you dip em    they re worth a try if you haven t been
I would come back. It s no free birds but it s good and different. Lots of veggie options.  They need one more north.

Oh my word. Or shall I say world  Cause it s definitely been rocked  I usually get a burrito but a friend of mine suggested the fish tacos and boy  was it worth it. Get the deluxe. Also try their mint sweet tea  I use a lot of mint in my dishes and drinks and I believe they have a blend of Shiso mint leaves and southern sweet tea. If someone finds out. Lmk

Our office just moved to this part of Austin.  Stopped in with a co-worker who recommended it for lunch.  Could tell immediately that Cabo Bob s is a popular place to go.  The restaurant is styled after the Chipotle model but with much greater variety.  Loved my Baja fish tacos    And  pricing is very affordable which means I will go back.

I call in my order because this place is always packed at lunch. I eat here at least once a week. Chicken with Red Salsa  Beef Fajita with Tomatillo  or the Crispy Fish and Queso  all the bowls are excellent  They do great catering for my parties also.

Let me first say that my rating is really a 3.5     but I m rounding down.   Cabo Bob s is an A-OK establishment. However  It s nothing I would go out of my way for. If I lived here  I would eat this place prob 2-3 times a week because of its convenience and price point  but this isn t a place I would take an out-of-towner to blow their taste buds away.   It s pretty much a step above Chipotle  which isn t a bad thing. I got a 1 2 Chicken 1 2 Pork burrito in a cheddar tortilla. Again  not bad at all. It was just a typical burrito  nothing more.

Why are you reading reviews  Get in the car  drive to Bob s and order some tacos or burritos. You re still reading  Car  Bob s burittos  go  now  you won t be disappointed. My only regret  There is no Bob s across the street at home  on the other hand  I d be broke  even though Bob is reasonably priced. You re not still reading are you

Was looking for a quick dinner while in the area and spotted Cabo Bobs. It has the same concept as Chipotle where you go down the line picking which meats and veggies you want in your burrito  bowl  or salad. They also offer tacos and set bowls burritos to choose from. Some things I liked   1  they have 4 different tortillas to choose from and they roll it out and press them when you order  Neato. 2  they offer tilapia...haven t seen any other  fast food  burrito place offer fish  3  they have fresh jalapenos   4  BOTTLED MEXICAN COKE - you know it tastes so much better than regular coke. REAL CANE SUGAAAR 5  a variety of sauces salsas to toss on top. There s also a XX spicy sauce....it packs the heat.  If you re looking for a quick bite to eat that s delicious  stop in at Cabo Bobs

Average place. Many more burrito joints in town. I would recommend Freebirds. Food here is mediocre. I wanted fish tacos and while they have a number of option they fry the fish. WTF   Baja fish tacos should not be fried... I miss Wahoos.   Anyhow  it s sustenance and that s about all I can say. Average chain at best.

I don t think I could like a  fast food  burrito and taco joint more than Cabo Bobs - at that s saying a lot.   I used to live and breath by Chipotle. Coming from the Midwest Chipotle was  it . The best. And then I moved to Austin  TX.   First  the meat is so freaking tender. Every bite - plus I love the spices they use. Also  they put a lot of meat in their burritos - and my favorite - the bowls. I mean a lot.   Second  the array of grilled vegetables - onions  zucchini and squash  and poblanos. The queso is top notch and the mango pico is what dreams are made of.   Third  the chips are perfect. Freshly made and crunchy. They also make their tortillas homemade AND made to order. There are choices too - buttermilk  ancho chili  cilantro tomatillo  cheddar  and corn.   Finally  the customer service has never let me down. They are always friendly and accommodating    I can t say enough good things about Cabo Bobs - the only suggestion for YOU - not the Bobs - is to be prepared for lines and don t let that turn you off. The lines are good - that means people are willing to wait because the food is that darn amazing

If you re coming here  make sure you haven t eaten in at least 24 hours. The burritos here are ENORMOUS and really delicious.   The coolest thing about this place is the fact they make your tortilla right in front of you. It s kinda like dinner and a show. The tortilla flavors are also really intriguing and taste great.  My one issue  and it s a very small issue  is that the burrito is almost too big. Once you pack all of these ingredients into the burrito you can never get a bite of everything at once  so you re left eating a bite of just chicken or one of just the vegetables. However  individually they taste great so I m really not too mad about it.   Also  if you come here make sure you get their homemade pepper sauces. They are absolutely delicious. I literally put it on every bite of my burrito. It had a nice heat and delicious flavor

This is just an update.   The manager promptly responded to my disappointed review and offered a refund and vouchers to try the place again. I live in Houston but I m looking forward to giving them another shot when I m in town again. That manager reaching out  will go a long way.

So  yes  this place is one of the many Chipotle clones that have sprung up in recent years. Having said that  they re really good. They probably offer the biggest burrito I ve seen yet  and it was good. Not as spectacular as the original  but good. Certainly huge enough to be worth they price.
I loved this place I got 3 tacos for under  10   such a great deal and everything in custom made   the line was long but they are super quick and friendly. I will definitely be visiting again soon.

Been coming to this location for 4 yrs  At least twice a month  I love everything  The staff has always been nice and the place is very clean. On my way there now and why I m finally giving them 5 stars   Thank you for always delivering deliciousness
Love this place military discount is awesome    If you are looking for a good wait great healthy way to enjoy a burrito with all the fixings go to Cabo Bobs

I was blown away when I saw the giant press and turning stove for cooking the freshly pressed tortilla. Wow. The ingredients were fresh and I ordered straight from the menu without any changes. Makes chipotle seem like McDonald s. Burrito was amazing  tacos next time  salad bowl the time after. Awesome

This place was delicious. I went here with some co-workers for lunch. The line was long  but not ridiculously long as in out of the front door. Luckily  the line moved quickly. Cabo Bob s offers a variety of proteins  as well as vegetarian options such as salads.   What is really neat  is that they offer several flavors of homemade tortillas. There is a person making the tortillas fresh in front of you when you start at the ordering line. Flavors include ancho chile  cheddar tortilla  wheat tortilla  and a cilantro tomatillo tortilla. I did not try the flavored tortillas this time around  but I will in the future.   For lunch  I ate a crispy fish  bowl  with whatever toppings I wanted to mix in. I chose to mix in cilantro lime rice  cheese  lettuce  pico  salsa  cilantro  and jalepenos. The serving was generous  however  somehow I managed to eat it all  This is a great place for groups and I will be returning. The only reason I rated Cabo Bob s as 4 stars is due to my desire to see lower prices.

Delicious food BUT the counter is so high that when my friend in a wheelchair rolled through the line  not one employee serving could see her. Every single one  6 of them  asked me what she wanted. Frankly  it was embarrassing. Even the employees seemed embarrassed. To get her order  they had to lean far over the food to see this young woman in her wheelchair. Great food  but people on wheelchairs need to be seen and visible.

My husband and I stopped by Cabo Bobs for lunch on a Friday afternoon and loved it  We re not from Austin  but we will be visiting Cabo Bobs anytime we re in Austin and want some tacos    We both got tacos. Myself  the number 2  which are deluxe fish tacos. My husband  pork tacos. The fish tacos were perfectly crisp and the pork was flavorful. Also  the tortillas were delicious  Freshly pressed the second we ordered them.   Also  the sugar cane and bottled sodas were a plus  If I had to choose over Freebirds  Chipotle  or Bob s  I would definitely chose Bob s

I like to tell people that Cabo Bobs is the perfect blend of chipotle and freebirds... but with homemade tasting tortillas. Price is pretty competitive too   They have a setup similar to Chipotle. The walk through line and all. Fresh ingredients  a wide variety of meat  vegetable  and salsa options. One of the best parts of cabo bobs is there soda fountain. A large variety of pure cane sugar sodas  Also  they have their own very weird  but delicious salsas. Its like a happy mixture between bbq sauce and tabasco. But it works   Give this place a try  You will not be disappointed

Cabo Bob s Burritos... I have so many wonderful things to say  First  the staff was incredibly friendly and helpful    I have never eaten here before and it all looked so good so I was being really indecisive. The guy picked out three tacos and let me try one of each   A chicken  brisket  and fish. They were all sooo so good. My favorite was the fish taco but I really loved them all  I finished them so quick  They have fresh ingredients  great flavors  and the yummiest tortillas I ve ever had  They have a cute little outside patio with music and lights.. good little atmosphere
Oh hell yes  This place is legit.  It s a toss up between here and Freebirds. They are both equally good in my opinion  but different enough to add some variety.

This rating is strictly based on my experience THAT day. The food and all are great  Delicious  no question about that.   Now I went there on Wednesday  8 21 19  in the evening for dinner. I had steak burrito and as I chewed my third or fourth bite  I felt something hard. I tried to put pressure on it with my teeth and it felt like plastic. So I removed it and what did I find  A piece of METAL. A METAL  I was very fortunate to not chomp hard to damage my teeth  pierce my mouth  worst...image if I swallow it  I came to the cashier and she called a manager  not sure if he is the manager but who else  . He asked me and I gestured that it was in my mouth and I removed it  I am Deaf  FYI . He handed me an order sheet and remade what I ordered. That s it.  One problem is he did not look surprised  shock  or worst...not even apologize  A piece of metal  come on  that is beyond serious. AND I still lost my money  haha . I should have taken pictures of it first but I  did tell my friends so that way they cannot accuse me of  lying .   I am very nervous to return to that place again. Clearly quality is not up to par...    Update    8 26 19  I emailed via Cabo Bob s comment card about the incident. I was contacted by the  General Manager  John Bimler  who was  awesome. In the end  he corrected the situation and I was satisfied. He gets 5 stars
10 10. Only thing that sucks is the long line during lunch hours. Everyone is friendly and the food is amazing

Best burritos in town. No question about it. More people need to know that chain burrito places that I will not name are trash compared to the quality of ingredients Cabo Bobs. Starting with a far superior tortilla.

Building your own fish tacos  it s basically like a chipotle   choose the type of seafood and add your own toppings  the food was amazing here  couldn t ask for anything more  they also have different kinds of tortillas like spinach  very beachy Hawaiian feel inside which is comforting and an awesome chill spot

Delicious burrito with fresh made tortilla to order. That was the highlight  and the there was a cool vibe but most importantly the flavors were totally there. The queso is on point. This place is what Chipotle wishes it could be.

We have ordered catering from Cabo Bobs  many times - they are always incredible   Timely  delicious  and such a great value for what they bring    Full-on deliciousness. We will keep ordering from Cabo Bobs for all our partying needs

We have been looking for a good fish taco place for a long time and just sort of stumbled across Cabo Bob s on our way home to New Braunfels.  Man oh man am I glad we made the choice to have lunch here.  I cannot say enough about the freshness of the food or the flavor.  I loved the fish tacos   I am so excited to see they are opening up a location in San Antonio.  Not nearly as far a drive as Austin  for a fish taco craving.  Open fast   please

Had business in Austin and my lady was hungry so we endured the God knows why it s so long chickfila drive through line to arrive at Cabo Bob s.  It was well worth the trouble   This is fresh food freshly prepared.  I watched as our tortillias were freshly prepared.  I couldn t pass up another chance to enjoy the  4 fish burrito and behind the make line I spotted my old friend Mark working hard chopping up chicken and steak for fajitas.  My lady was waiting outside at a comfortable table--the mounted fans and shade made the summer heat tolerable.  I even got a chance to say hi to Mark as he carried out a bag of trash and he helped us locate the least spicy BBQ sauce for my lady s brisket burrito.  Had to run to a 2PM Dr. s appt. that lasted over two hours but I retrieved my Cabo Bob s fish burrito as I sat in Austin traffic afterward. I munched happily as I slowly moved south on Manchac and the flavors of the fresh food filled my mouth and the empty spot in my stomach. Mmmmmmmm Good     I ll be back if God is willing.

I have to first say I rate places on EVERYTHING not just the food. Customer Service goes a long ways. I stood in line for more than 5 minutes and never received a greeting or a welcome. I was rushed through the line and was unable to ask questions about the menu or different sauces.  They charge extra for queso on the burrito but it was more like colored water drizzled on top. They use a small piece of foil to wrap the burrito and the  queso  drips out. I asked for a bowl and the cashier made sure to explain they have foil and bowls are for those who order a bowl. I continued to ask for a bowl while the watery  queso  dripped down my arm. I finally got a bowl with a lid and other than the cashiers explanation I had no other friendly conversation with any of the workers.  The burrito was average  not much different from other burrito spots but for the price and distasteful service I would go elsewhere.
So delicious   Get the fish tacos  They re made perfectly and the tortillas are extremely fresh

I am beyond confused with all the good reviews.  The line was out the door and with all the good  reviews I was excited to try Cabo Bobs.  I love the idea of the fresh tortilla right as you order it  so theirs my one star.   The portions of food are huge for the price so that s cool  but I don t just want quantity  my burrito bowl was extremely bland and my husband burrito with  marinated  chicken was even blander  The guacamole was real avocado but zero seasoning  onion or lime and tiny for the price.    No way Cabo Bob  more like Cabo blah.
Outstanding burritos I will be a regular now   The prices are just right too at 11 dollars with a drink . I recommend this burritos anytime.

Before I post my review I want to just state that I m not a fan of Chipotle but I do like Qdoba  if that puts anything into perspective.   I would say this place is pretty good  I liked the different types of tortillas you can choose from  and the ingredients were incredibly fresh. I also liked their local made soda and fresh punch. Service was great and for a first timer they were patient enough to explain everything for me.   The reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5  is the simple fact that I don t see this as a place you  MUST  try or even a place I crave. It s a good place for Mexican food loving friends  but it was just simply good  not great.

We ordered 3 burritos for take out. two grilled chicken and one shrimp. All ingredients were fresh  but the flavor was less than impressive. The burritos left something to be desired.... as a person who has chomped down burritos from all over California and New York City... check out Texacana Cafe off Manchaca.

Good place to get a burrito if your in the area. Has great choices to pick from. The burrito could be shared between two people. Customer service is not bad. There was no line to wait in. Overall not bad. Worth a try.

I LOVE CABO BOBS BURRITOS    My boyfriend and I visited for the first time March 7 after our trip to the Domain we wanted something filling to eat without breaking the bank. I had this place bookmarked because I wanted to try the fish tacos I kept seeing in the photos.  I love the fact they make fresh flour tortillas classic and flavored in 3 different choices. I ordered the  3 Baja style on corn. I had it with everything it was suppose to come with. My boyfriend ordered the  1 which came on flour tortilla.   We were both extremely satisfied with the freshness  crunch  and flavors of the fish tacos. He said they were the best fish tacos he d ever had and I have to agree with him.  I REALLY HOPE AND PRAY they open a location in Houston because I will be the first person there to come support  but for now since Austin isn t too far away I will definitely be coming back.
Cabo bobs is the only place I m eating until the day I die. I have found what I love and I m letting it kill me.

My Deluxe Fish Tacos were wonderful  could ve eaten two of the three of the Fish taco plate but also had the fries and the nachos.. next time I ll share..my niece s quesadilla was huge for a kid and looked sooo cheesy    Service was pretty fast and would definitely go again

I really enjoy coming here when I do. My experience everytime has been awesome everytime I come to eat. The staff is very friendly and work as a team to ensure they can get the customer served pretty quickly because as I mentioned in my previous update  it gets busy here during lunch time on the week days.   Today it was pretty busy earlier than usual. As the line kind of started to back up I noticed the employee preparing the tortillas help the staff who was putting the ingrediants you wanted in your meal while they were getting more food from the kitchen. That I admired for the team work they presented. They ensured your meal was filled correctly.  I like to order the bowls here but I have had a lot of other things on the menu. Like I said before this place is way better than Chipotle and Freebirds  The food tastes fresh everytime I have come here  Keep up the great work Cabo Bobs Burritos

Just passing through Austin and decided to stop at Cabo Bob s for the first time    I ordered a fish burrito. The cilantro tomatillo tortilla was spot on. I love how they prepare your tortillas. I definitely prefer their tortillas over Chipotle Freebird s. I would rate the overall burrito over Chipotle s though but not Freebird s  only because I felt like my burrito was lacking a bit of umph.   I wouldn t mind coming back and trying it out again though. The entire restaurant had a good vibe to it and there are many options to choose from.
Delicious   I got the chicken bowl   Guacamole is exactly how I like it     I will be back for more

I finally made it to Cabo Bob s  and I wish I had stopped by sooner   I had the deluxe fish tacos.  It was very tasty and really hit the spot.  I enjoyed the variety of tortillas  and they were filled with quality ingredients.  I ll make it a point to stop again soon.

Not a traditional Mexican burrito but preety good none the less. I recommend the ancho chile tortilla. I must say everything from the meat options to the veggies are great either a bowl  tacos or a burrito u wont be dissapointed always clean n a good deal for the price.

My husband wanted to try this burrito joint after reading about it on this website   a href   redir url http 3A 2F 2Ffivethirtyeight.com 2Ftag 2Fcabo-bobs-burritos 2F amp s 65727de8e6970c17586b3f9788a86dffb88fad984b18a99b1b5bc53f6883243b  rel  nofollow  target  _blank  fivethirtyeight.com tag    a   So on our recent trip to Austin  we made it a priority to go. We were not disappointed  The freshly made tortillas take this Build-Your-Own Burrito place to the next level. They also have plenty of vegan vegetarian options  Yay   I ordered the tacos and tried three different kinds of their tortillas for each of my tacos  it was a good decision . I made some mistakes with my combos  so next time I ll know better  but even with mistakes it was still a delicious meal.
Fresh tortillas made in front of you  The brisket  chips and guacamole  it all looked good though  Will definitely go back to try more things

My favorite guilty pleasure for tacos and queso. I have never had a bad taco at Cabo Bob s. It s all about the flavor tortillas. They come in flavors  my favorite is the cheddar. The ingredients are fresh and you watch the employees make your dish. It s always taste so good. The only negative is that you can t have Cabo Bob s on a Sunday  they are closed.
Veggie burrito was not very good- too many onions overpowered the whole taste  Fish tacos were not good either  food trucks in Austin are a better alternative imo
This place blows any other burrito joint out of the water.  1. Can t wait till the next time I m back in Austin TX

This is probably my favorite burrito place to go to. They have lots of different options to choose from including a brisket burrito   They have many different tortillas to pick from and their fish is my favorite.  Also  their staff is super sweet  The guy who helped me out last time was named JC and he was super friendly  They were really busy but JC took the time to ask me how my day was and he didn t make me feel rushed. Everyone was kind and my friend who went with me for the first time LOVED it   -D

Great for a quick lunch... service was fast even though there was a line wrapped around the restaurant... I had the fish burrito and it was delicious but I added way to many jalape os and made it super spicy

Surprise of all surprises  Cabo Bob s caters   So my friend ordered a tray of fish tacos for like 20 people and I was shocked at the amount of food we were provided with. They gave us what must have been 60  tortillas  all 4 varieties  cilantro  buttermilk  cheddar  ancho chili   a small tray of shredded cabbage  a full tray of their awesome fish  perfectly salted  a quart of salsa pico  a container of cilantro  chopped onions and some chipotle creme sauce. And it tasted just like fresh Cabo Bob s  though the tortillas got a little not as awesome only because of the time wait .  They also threw in a free tray of their tortilla chips. Despite all my trips there  I ve never tried the chips  mostly because I get stuffed from the burrito by itself. But I must say without a doubt  they are the best chips I ve ever had in my life  clearly made in house  salted to perfection  thick and crisp. Goes perfect with their salsa pico and if they offered nachos  I m sure it d be amazing too.  What does Cabo not do

We really love Cabo Bobs  It s always very clean  the employees are super helpful and nice  and the food is always fresh  I ve eaten here maybe 4 times before writing a review but they are definitely deserving of a great one   Sometimes my 1 year old and I are driving and get hungry and I know when I come here  the employees are grabbing the high chair for me. They offer to fill my drink  get me napkins and just make sure I have a pleasant time even with a screaming baby lol. The cooks are always getting creative with me for off menu items like mixing up the tortillas to make different flavors  I love it here

Cabo Bob s has always been my favorite spot for oversized burritos  taco bowls etc.  over chipotle and freebirds. Very original  great taste and love the options of drinks  Nothing on this menu has been disappointing  I don t usually eat burritos but when I do  its Cabo bobs     Dont forget to try the guacamole and queso and the original sodas    Yum yum yum        This place gets very packed  but the wait is so worth it  if you need your order quick at lunch time I recommend you place your order online and pick it up at the register

Build your own or choose one from the menu like the  6 Brisket and Queso. Been coming here for several years and never disappointed.  Surfing decor with a Baja California theme  TV s and plenty of seating. Outdoor patio as well.
My son  amp  I agree this is our FAVORITE restaurant. Their fish tacos are the BEST BEST BEST  And they have upscale sodas  if you don t consider that an oxymoron
Love this place    The tortillas homemade and come in 4 flavors  delicious. The ingredients top notch.

What we got   3 fish tacos  You wouldn t expect this place to be as good as it is  but it is  We got the fish tacos  she ordered them on ancho tortillas  I got them on buttermilk tortillas  and they did not disappoint. Tons of flavor  Just like the rivals  you choose your type of tortilla  meat  and fillings. They offer a wide range of tortilla flavors but the buttermilk was amazing. I would recommend you choose that if its your first time. The service was fast and friendly too  Combine all that with a sub  20 total  for 2 people  and you got yourself a 5-star joint
Employees ALWAYS have a great attitude  they always create a great environment and makes guests feel welcome by engaging in conversation and maintaining a smile. The food is always fresh and tasty

Love the idea of having four different choices of tortilla  all prepared fresh in front of you to begin the assembly of your order. Beyond that  Cabo Bob s is pretty similar to many of the other chain or chain-like build-your-burrito places out there  e.g. Chipotle  Qdoba  etc . The fresh tortillas give this place an edge  for sure  but I have to say the meats here are slightly lacking in flavor. They re totally fine  but seem to be missing something...

It was my first time visiting Cabo Bob s. I ve passed by the one near UT but I ve never been. It was overall a very nice experience. Employee by name J.C.  as stated on his name tag  gave me a brief run through on the menu and the different items I could get. JC also let me sample the different proteins which helped me get a better grasp of what I wanted to order. Cashier Shane offered a drink and finished things off. Overall and awesome experience.
This place is awesome. Fresh food and great service Long lines during lunch hour but that is expected since it is affordable and great quality

This is my favorite burrito place of all time.   They just do it right. Tortillas are prepared per order and they use a pool of  Big Green Egg  smokers to cook their meats.   Superior taste   quality when compared to places like Freebirds  Chipotle  etc  Excellent.   edit   Not only do they have the best burritos in town  but they have an unbelievable amount of respect for their customers. Hands down  the best spot for this type of food in Austin.
My Favorite burritos. The tortillas are the best. I could eat here daily with the variety too

Hit up the Brisket  amp  Queso burrito   Ba-BAMM  The combination is a Slam dunk for the burrito world  But dont get too excited b c the brisket isn t like Franklin s or La Barbeque.. What makes it Great is the sizeable portion of brisket  meat is tender not too fatty  more like slow cooked roast and the Queso isn t watered down nor makes a big mess...its Just the right consistency   They have lots of options besides just chicken or beef such as fish  pork  and a vegetarian option.  Lunchtime gets a little packed but is a great place to go regardless
This time I had the pulled pork tacos. OMG - mouth watering  I will definitely become a regular.

Put in a to-go order since that s all you can do right now. Rice was severely undercooked  brisket was super greasy  like I could fill a shot glass with the grease falling out of this burrito  I couldn t eat the whole thing and then I preceded to get food poisoning. Been here a couple of times and this is the first time I have gotten sick. Spent my night on the toilet and throwing up. Won t be coming back.

The best burritos in the world. Iv probably been going to Bobs for 8 years or so and they have never disappointed. If you find a better burrito  especially in Austin  please let me know. The Staff is always nice. The food is always fresh The fountain drinks are unconventional and the atmosphere is great. What else do you need for a great restaurant

I ve eaten here several times and everything is delicious  There tortillas alone are worth the trip. Today I got fish tacos which are fried. I m sure they are about as healthy as the chipotle crema that put on top  but man are they tasty  My only complaint about this place is that the staff all has RBF. They scowl the whole time like they hate their life and or you.   I ordered online because I know that place is a zoo from 11 30-2. I got there about 3 minutes after my quoted pick up time and still had to wait an additional 7-8 minutes. The girls looked mad at me because my order wasn t ready. Too bad the food is so delicious  otherwise I d likely not return. So 4 stars specifically for the food. It s a fast food chain  so it s not like my whole  dining experience  was ruined based on the bad attitudes and mean mugs. Service and hospitality rating would be around 2 stars.

Cabo Bobs over Chipotle any day.  I can t believe I didn t try Cabo Bob s until my junior year of college. This is probably one of my greatest regrets because their food is soooooooo good.  Setup is similar to Chipotle as it s like an assembly line and you tell the employees what you want. If you order a special  the recommended list of food on the left of the line   you tell them what number and they do everything for you. They make their tortillas in house and right in front of your eyes. Best tortillas ever  If you re in doubt on what to order  get the fish tacos. It s probably one of the best things i ve put in my mouth. Ingredients are always super fresh here.    They have a parking lot and parking is free  Hallelujah since they re located near west campus  a parking nightmare. Plenty of seating inside and outside. The only complaint is that they have those hard brown paper towels instead of napkins but if I m paying  7 for a meal  I can t really complain.   If Cabo Bob s moved closer to the university or the heart of west campus  they would probably knock Chipotle out of business.

I love this place. The food is always fresh and delicious  The staff is great  There is one guy who is kind of a grump... He never smiles and is kind of rude  he wears glasses and is kinda tall  just ignore him. I come here all the time

I m lucky in that I get sent to Austin for work now and then.  When in town  I always stay near the airport as my office is in that area.
