I appreciated that offer  and told him as much  but due to just how sick I got on the guacamole  and the fact other family members got sick several weeks later after eating the same thing  again  those that did not eat the guac didn t get sick   I told him I really didn t have the desire to try it again at all. He was pleasant  but that s where it lays.  Thanks Bob  I do hope things work out  but I m still going to have to pass. Cheers.

Most UT-Austin kids would agree that this place trumps Chipotle...always. The main difference  When I think Cabo vs Chipotle  I just think Cabo is more  clean  in every aspect. Hard to describe  but for now  let s talk food.  Walking in you ll notice the decor is bright and colorful. The ordering style is exactly like chipotle but they have 3 different tortilla flavors you can get. I don t ever get the other 2 so I ll only talk about the cilantro tomatillo. Can you taste the cilantro  Probably not  but it s pretty neat to eat a green buritto. You can also get the flavors triple taco-size style.   I believe this place has  more meats than chipotle too..One thing that stands out is the fish. Portioning-wise  IIRC they re pretty generous and give you 2 per taco. I ve only gotten the burritos recently but getting the tacos with fish is always a great go-to for newbies. Anyways  there is no proper combination of ingredients so just throw in whatever looks good. If you get the fish make sure to get the pico on it too.  Lots of sauces to choose from as well. I always get something different so I don t remember anything of them at all. All of them sound and taste good anyway.  Finally  that punch card nets you a free burrito per 6 burritos OR a cabo-bob s t-shirt  which I feel as though is worth it a lot more. Plus  you re going to be coming back here anyway so you don t even have to take into account that you have to buy 6 burritos   P  any menu item  not specifically burritos .  All in all  I ve gone here several times these past few years and there s nothing really holding me back. Price is fair  if not seemingly cheaper than chipotle  but I never compare because the portions are generous to make me think it s cheaper .   9 10  would always come back again and definitely recommend to a friend.

If you like burritos  tortillas  or cane sugar sodas  you will love this place. The frequent diner card is really generous too  buy 6 get 1 free. You will not regret giving this place a try. Mostly I go for the three tacos on three different flavors of tortillas  at no extra charge  with chicken or fried fish.  The burritos are just too massive for me.  This spot hopped on my lunch rotation a while back  and it s there to stay   Seriously the freshly made tortillas are very special and so is the 66 sauce.  If you try the XXtra hot sauce your nose will water in a good way.
Fun atmosphere with great tasting food. I enjoy their tacos  Great place for a quick in and out trip or if you want to stay awhile.

Great food for a great price  I went here due to a friend s raving recommendation and I m happy I finally did so  I tend to avoid this area of town because of having to street park  but this place had a large parking lot  The place is pretty much like Chipotle but with more options  The thing that made this place stand out was the option to choose fish as your protein  They certainly don t hold back on the amount of fish - or any of the toppings  really. They kept piling the toppings higher and higher - all with a smile on their face  Love the variety of toppings and sauces. Food was wonderful  and it was all for an affordable price    The environment itself was great as well. It was clean and spacious. For some reason  there were a lot of law enforcement  city police and state troopers  dining in  so it made me feel pretty safe  I saw lots of people order large bags of take-out  so it s a popular and fast place that can feed all sorts of people. If I was in this area more often  this would definitely be a place that I frequent at. Bonus discovery - it has free wifi there
We love Cabo bobs    For the most food- get a steak burrito.   For the best bite proportions  get the tacos. I usually do 2 steak and 1 fish  Smoker cheddar tortillas all day...
Giant and delicious burritos. Fresh ingredients. Friendly staff. Solid punch card program  six burritos gets you one free . I come here weekly and have never been disappointed.

I m new to the area and a coworker told me to check this place out and it was great   Chipotle and freebird are ok..... but this place was awesome   Next time you want a burrito  go here you won t be disappointed

Cabo Bob s is by far the best burrito place in Austin. Far superior to Chipotle  Freebird s etc. The staff is always friendly and provides great service. Management at the location near campus is truly awesome. If you ever find yourself near the UT campus  definitely stop here  and make sure to get the queso

Such a quality burrito joint. I always enjoy a nice custom burrito from here whenever I am hungry. They have never disappointed nor will they ever in my opinion. If you have not tried it  I would definitely recommend   thetruthshallsetyoufree

We ve tried Qdoba and Chiptole  and heard about Cabo Bob s. We were lazy one night and ordered it via delivery service  favor or something - boyfriend got the burrito  I got the salad.  Oh my gosh is this delicious burrito heaven. SO much better than Chiptole  and my favorite new place  sorry Qdoba . The ingredients were delicious  and the aboslutely LOAD your toppings on. Amazing flavor  so filling  and reasonable prices.  The only downside I suppose is that they charge for sour cream...  If you really want to nitpick. But I don t because HECK YES TO THIS BURRITO SPOT

oh. em. gee. do I love this place  I ve been going to Cabo Bob s near West Campus since they opened a while back and have yet to be disappointed.   1. Their burritos are giant.. every time I eat here and order a burrito  I end up with two meals because I could never finish one in a single sitting.   2. The tortilla flavors  I love the fact that you can choose the flavor of your tortillas. So. Dang. Good.   3. The BEST chips   queso. It probably sounds crazy that the best chips and queso would come from a what appears to be a simple burrito chain  but not I know   but it does  You have to try their chips and queso for yourself.   Love this place and their management.  Top notch local business.

This place is so good  The meats are marinated and cooked perfectly. The chips are thick and one of the best I ve had in Austin. Also ask for the chipotle crema it is the special sauce for anything you get here.

Didn t know I needed a better version of Chipotle until I tried this place. Not only are there more options  but they also take that extra step with each ingredient to make it better than the competitors. I was also just sold on them having fried fish as a protein option. Not only was it made to order  but they also LOADED my bowl up with 6 substantial pieces of it.
If there is any line expect to wait at least 10 minutes. Quite slow and rather inefficient but for some reason everyone comes here and I will also continue to.
Some of the best burritos in town  You can t go wrong with really anything on the menu. Definitely recommend the cheddar tortillas

Second time at Cabo Bob s  but it s my first time at this location close to the UT campus. My first visit to Cabo Bob s was about three years ago  and I was looking forward to seeing if there were any changes.   I came around 1 PM  and the line was still fairly long. The plus side was that the line moved extremely fast - good thing  too  cause my friend and I were HUNGRY. We deliberately ate a light breakfast in order to prepare for the mammoth sizes of Cabo Bob s burritos. And mammoth they were  We both ordered the fish burrito - still just as delicious and filling as I remember them to be. However  I noticed that the fish pieces were much smaller than they were before. Nevertheless  the burrito was delicious. Every bite had a different flavor  because all the fillings were mixed well within the burrito.   Will be back to try some of the other items on their menu

I m not sure if I mean this but I think it s better than Chipotle. I was extremely excited about the tortillas made on the spot. The burrito is HUGE and the price is reasonable. Just a bit far from campus but definitely worth going.

Cabo Bob s is my favorite restaurant around campus. Think of everything you like about Chipotle minus the E. Coli plus better variety  better taste  and better quantity for price. There was one point in time where I came here at least twice a week for a few months.  My personal favorite is a fried fish burrito  loaded up with nearly every option. Another great addition is your ability to choose and mix different tortillas. The line  no matter how long it looks  moves rapidly  and the staff are very friendly. When my friends and I are trying to think of places to eat  Cabo Bob s is always at the top of our list.

Oh...my...sweet...burrito gods. I ve grown up on chipotle thinking it was the king  but this place is the one true king. I felt like a kid at a candy shop with all the fixings I could insert into my pillowy cilantro tomatillo tortilla. The rice was perfect and the brisket was tender and juicy. Get the baja beans  so dang good. I got lost when I got to the sauces veggies extras. I babbled some words and they crafted my masterpiece. Hella good stuff  and I split their  a href   redir url http 3A 2F 2Fbomb.com amp s bb4f996415a9c2f21137e27cfb68f439a48cec2652b53e9b50dd7e766dbe177e  rel  nofollow  target  _blank  bomb.com  a  queso with a buddy.   You can t go wrong here... Seriously  you can t. Go try  bet you can t. If you can... Then you don t deserve this place anyway.

WORTH IT. I always feel like I have a food baby afterwards because their burritos are HUGE  but it s all so delicious. I recommend getting the  green tortilla   or Cilantro Tomatillo  if you re getting a burrito. They press the tortillas right in front of you and they have a good selection of meats  sides  etc. to top off your burrito creations.  It can get very busy sometimes  there have been a couple of times where the line went out the door   but the line generally moves pretty fast.  It s one of my favorite places near campus  I d choose this place over places like Chipotle and Qdoba any day.

I love this place  I m usually not the biggest fan of burritos tacos but Cabo Bob s is awesome  It s definitely the freshly pressed tortillas that take it over the top for me. They get nice and semi-crispy  so there s more of a texture to them than Chipotle tortillas. It s also cool that they have different flavors of tortillas. Some people say they can taste the difference  but I gobbled mine up too quickly to tell  oops .  My friends recommended the crispy fish and man  those were so good. I wasn t super hungry that day  so I got tacos instead of a burrito  and I completely devoured them. Each taco had not one  but TWO big pieces of fish  Yay more to love   . The mango salsa was also really good.  I wish I lived in Austin so I could come here more...but alas  it is a treat for the few times I visit. Open one in Houston pretty please

I heard of Cabo Bob s when others at my church would hire them for catering. I went and am quite a fan  Fresh and piping hot homemade tortillas and so many choices for salads  tacos  burritos you will wish you had more tummy room for all the selections. Be sure and try the mango salsa and the queso here. You can choose from a menu or you can create your own plate. Everything is soooo good. I hear they are working on a north location soon  near  Anderson Lane.

This place is great    Not only is the food great but the servers are completely focused on making your food the best it could possibly be. One of the workers named Rosa can roll the biggest of burritos like its absolutely nothing  5 5 would recommend every time

I ve been waiting a long long time to try Cabo Bob s in south Austin. For many different reasons  I haven t been able to make the commute to the original location. Well  look at my luck -- They have one right near campus now   Two things I can say about this location  the customer service is really really good and the food will leave you very very satisfied.  Do not mess around  Get the 3 tacos in the build your own section  It s by far the best value. We were greeted by the first employee at the tortilla machine  who was very sweet and walked us through all of the choices.  Best part...  choose a tortilla type  Buttermilk Flour Ancho Chili Cilantro Tomatillo  Awesome  Smokey Cheddar  Amazing   Yes  They have the little dough balls for the tortillas right there. They press them into a tortilla right in front of you and throw them onto a flat grill. Everything about this made me very happy.  I chose the 3 tacos because you can make each taco unique. It s own tortilla style  fillings  toppings. It s like getting to try 3 separate plates. I loved that   You can fill the taco with white or brown rice  3 types of beans  regular guac or some sort of wild guacamole with even more delicious veggies mashed in.  The part that I really enjoyed were the various types of sauces that you could add on. I got a lot of these sauces on the side to try. It actually reminded me a lot of VERTs. I wanted to mix and match the sauces. The employees were well informed. They knew exactly which sauce went with which. The names are really hard to remember  but I think it was the 66 Red sauce that was just to die for with the brisket taco. It almost had a smoky BBQ sauce flavor  but it was a less thick than regular BBQ sauce. My favorite sauce out of all of them was the Chipotle crema. Killer flavor paired with a breaded fish taco.  I love that this is near campus  I almost wish it was closer  so I could walk from my office  The employees were mingling in the eating area since we went during the Christmas holidays  so a lot of them had special recommendations for us to try. This place also has Texas root beer and many other unique sodas to pair with your meal. Plenty of pure cane sugar  HFCS-free options.  Overall  a really yummy first experience.

This place is really great  with good options if you re on the go and want to eat clean. The ingredients are fresh and you can make a lot of different combinations work based on what you re looking for. I personally love the bowls and salads with grilled veggies and proteins. Also  the fish tacos are some of the best that I ve ever had for a splurge. They are fried  but a great choice on a cheat day.

I go to Cabo Bob s all the time. The food is delicious and fresh. The fresh tortillas are particularly amazing. The entire staff is friendly and helpful. I order to-go all the time and if the order is only a minute or two late  they try and make it up with a free drink or chips. In a city full of good food  Cabo is my favorite.
Any time I crave fish tacos I totally make the drive towards west campus for these. Honestly they are so big and perfect  Everything about these rock and I highly recommend them.

Cabo Bob s gives Torchy s a run for their money. Fresher  and more flavorful than other tex-mex places in town  you know you can count on Bob for a hot and delicious taco or burrito made-to-order as you watch. I m a huge fan of the  Just Fish Tacos   and you can t go wrong with the special queso. Cheap  fast  and fresh. Cabo Bob s definitely feels more personal if you re going for that fast food taco lunch but want something delicious.

This place is the best  Maybe it s the fish tacos  all the toppings  BYOB  build your own bowl   or the colorful flour tortillas made right in front of my eyes. Cabo Bobs is fresh  affordable  and I feel like I m getting my money s worth. My favorites are the fish tacos with the colorful tortillas  loaded with veggies  and salsas. Here at Cabo Bob s everything  is BYOB so whatever you want you can have it. If you haven t been here  you need to get over here. Plus this location is really nice and it s a perfect hang out spot with friends  family or just you.

We had a last minute birthday dinner and Cabo Bob s saved the day with their catering. The food is AMAZING   The tortillas are homemade  all the salsas and condiments are fresh. We are Mexican food snobs because of our heritage  and our travels all over Mexico.  We have now ditched all the other places that were just OK and will only go to Cabo Bob s  LOVE THIS PLACE

Oh my gosh  this place is fantastic    Everything there is so delicious. So many options and fresh food  Place gets super packed at lunch so expect a wait for to go or ordering. Definitely  worth it every time

I was sad to realize that this place had taken over for a cool bar that had entertainment the last time I had visited this locale.  I took out the burrito that I had ordered up.  I did get all of the free add ons which really cooled down the burrito once I got it home.  No one wants to eat a cold burrito.  I had to heat it up  guacamole and all in order to feel like it was dinner and not breakfast cereal.    I am sticking to real Mexicans making my Mexican food from now on.  Okay  the guy that heated my tortilla looked Mexican  but I am sure Cabo Bob is the Whitest  White guy in Austin.  I can t buy into this White Guy Burrito revolution perpetrated by these burrito establishments like Chipotle  Qdoba   Freebirds  and  unfortunately  now Cabo Bobs.  I love White People food  just not White People Burritos.

I ve heard so many great things about this place for the past couple years and now I ve experienced it myself. This is the place for any burrito lover. I was blown away by the size of their burritos. You really get your money s worth. As far as food taste and quality  Cabo Bob s stands much taller than the competition.
Great spot...everything is delicious. Definitely try the fish tacos   Cool and casual  good service and a lot of different options.

Man.... I thought I would NEVER say this... But Lord forgive me...   CABO BOB S IS BETTER THAN CHIPOTLE.  Seriously.... The portions  ingredients  that  I m in a seaside restaurant  feel  the PUNCH CARDS Hollaaa I m all about the loyalty reward business...  AND FISH   Woooo weeee I can t get enough.  Nowadays there s a lot of burrito restaurants but honestly Cabo Bob s is n mero uno. Thank you Mr. Bob for all that you do for this University  God bless and hook em
Oh my goodness the fajita beef was amazing    Fresh ingredients  We ll be coming often
Great tacos. Friendly service. The food was freshly made and the portions are just right.

This is one of my go-to spots for lunch. Massive portions  fair prices  really delicious food. The wait is never too long  though parking is occasionally an issue. It s hard not to default back to something as simply good as this more often than I probably should.   Greatest discovery of 2015  Quite possibly.

My all time favorite - way better than chipotle  I love the homemade tortillas  especially the cheddar ones. They have a variety selection to make your tacos burritos BOMB and the meats are full of flavor. You can never go wrong with adding their spicy sauce as well  I usually make my own tacos with the cheddar tortillas and fill those bad boys  Whatever you order from there  you will not be disappointed.

I have been a frequent eater of the O.G. Cabo Bob s on Ben White and am so happy they finally opened one within walking distance to my apartment.   I ve only been here once since it opened and will definitely be back at least once a week. Having recently gone  gluten-free   I ordered a bowl filled with chicken  brown rice  black beans  pico  regular and mango   lettuce  grilled onions and peppers and the mild sauce. I ate the bowl for dinner that night and the next since they stuffed that container full  which is definitely not a bad thing. When I used to drink sodas like they were water  the Dublin Dr. Depper and the Retro Big Red were my addictions. The frequent eater card and the plastic cups you can keep are added bonuses   Cab Bob s has my heart  which is conveniently located in my stomach

This was my first time eating at a Cabo Bob s and I have to say it was FABULOUS  Judging by the different choices of soft tortilla shells  the meat selection  and the fresh or saut ed vegetables and sauces available  Cabo Bob s already sets itself far above Chipotle or Baja Fresh  in my opinion. They even have unique soda flavors like Texas peach or old fashioned pink cream soda  If you want a big  flavorful meal that will carry you through both lunch and dinner  give this place a try
I really enjoyed it  Cool concept with the machine making the tortillas. Though  nothing seems more appealing than seeing it done by hand. That being said I gotta say I really liked it.

I ve always been a fan of Cabo Bob s but this is by far the best location of them all. Service and management rock  and my food is superb. Every. Time. Haven t been back to those other burrito places since I first tried Cabo Bob s. Get the queso while you re at it  it won t disappoint

Their burritos are different-- they can be in one of many different and tasty freshly pressed tortillas  they have the option of FISH      they have a mango sauce  their Ranch 66 sauce is so spicy and matches well with their burritos  and their burritos are HUGE and their portions for fish are very generous.   However  I always feel like I m eating food that has been out there for a while. Nothing tastes fresh-- even when you get fish that is straight from the fryer  something else looks and tastes old like the rice or the beans. Not a big fan of that. Kind of kills the whole experience. I d take a star away for that.
I love this place  Food is always great  and very affordable. The stamp card is awesome and only takes 6 meals to get something for free

This place has fresh tortillas and so many options to chose from  I love the fish and ancho rancho sauce it s not very spicy but creamy and smoky. Don t forget to get a puch card too  6 purchases gets you a free burrito or shirt.

As other reviews have noted  it operates like a Chipotle. However  I find the selection and quality of ingredients are far superior at Cabo Bob s.   I love the steak  cooked in green eggs    the chips  amp  queso  and the ancho chile tortillas. I recommend the chipotle crema sauce too.  Every time I go in  there are always plenty of people working which I appreciate because the food is fresh  the restaurant is clean  and the employees are happy  amp  friendly.

Sorry I don t get the hype at all - besides the tortilla  if I did a blind taste test I wouldn t know the difference between this and Qdoba  I ordered a pork burrito with an ancho chili tortilla  I do really like how they heat up the tortilla on a round stove  and threw rice  beans  roasted peppers  onions  guac  hot sauce and I felt like I got just a giant  not very tasteful carb-ball  I was hoping for some build in kick from the pork or the green sauce but it didn t come. I didn t add extra hot sauce at the drink station  but I don t think a good burrito or taco requires that you add some super-spicy hot sauce to give it flavor. This had very little flavor of it s own. I will say that for the size of the burrito the prices are pretty good.  7 for a massive  massive burrito.   If I m in the area again  maybe I ll give it one more shot  but this is definitely not a place I would go out of my way for

This review pains me to write. Being a Los Angeles local my whole life - I know burritos. Breakfast burritos  Carne Asada Burritos with Fries  colloquially known as a California burrito  or your standard jam packed Chipotle special...I have had it all. Cabo Bobs has changed the game. And they re very far from my home state of California. The fresh burrito-sized tortilla stopped me in my tracks. The plethora of ingredients was mind blowing. The cherry on top was the fresh fried fish loaded up in front of me. Couple that with the hot sauce and this might be the best burrito I have ever had in my life - a very bittersweet thing to admit.
Momma needed a burrito fix. Yum. We enjoyed the fish burrito with some chips and queso. It hit the spot. Ah  yes  their staff was friendly  too.
Food is excellent  I wish they had one in California. It s way better than Chipotle. I had the brisket and queso burrito that was very good. I will definitely be back.
I usually end up here once a week and it s amazing. Awesome service and great food. One of my favorite places around campus.

It is like a chipotle to the tenth power. The burritos are massive and super filling. Also  it is super tasty and you can different flavored tortillas  All their sauces are delicious and have a really nice souvenir cup
Pink watery salsa without even a bit of flavor  Tilapia as the fish  Wet meat  Reminiscent of Chipotle.
One of the best fast casual restaurants near UT  Management has always been quick to respond when we have catering requests  and they always do a stellar job.

The verdict is in  Cabo Bob s beats  Chipotle. Having eaten chipotle for a good chunk of my life may have made me jaded to it  but there is so much more variety at Cabo Bob s  You have to try the crispy fish. So good and they pack so much food into their burritos  Their chips and guacamole are great too  the chips are slightly thicker than most normal chips which is something I liked. Prices are good for what you get and I would definitely come back.   Also the staff is so friendly too  Always good to see staff who work so hard and are still able to interact with customers and smile. Makes the whole experience better.

My new favorite burrito place  I love the assortment of different flavored tortillas  probably my favorite aspect. I had a smoky cheddar tortilla but I ve heard great things about all flavors  I want to give ancho chili a try next time. Highly recommend to anyone who is looking for a good burrito. I was recommended this place by my friend Alisha who works there  overall great experience

This place is so amazing   I want to lather the queso all over my body. It tastes and feels so good. Oo yaaa.. the tortillas are from another planet. They are the secret to this. And the beef and chicken and fish and everything is SO GOOD. Everything is good. Trust me. Just get whatever and you will be like damn that s good. Because it s damn good. My friend Alisha works there and she recommended me this place and I can t thank her enough for showing me this heavenly place. It s truly an experience. Block out your calendar for the day and spend the whole day here. Might as well get married here also. I m proposing to my future wife at Cabo bobs. Thank you mr. Cabo bob

As a self-proclaimed tortilla snob  you must know that since they make their tortillas fresh to order I am totally obsessed with this place. There are 4 different varieties and I m completely content with the smokey cheddar flavor for the rest of my life. I watched them cook my tortilla from a doughy ball to a crispy  spotty perfect tortilla. If you re okay with weak ass  flaccid tortillas then you may not value Cabo Bob s as I do.   But seriously  I love simple food. If you don t feel there is some value in simple  fresh as fuck food  then you won t dig this place. By simple food  I mean rice  beans  sauteed zucchini  amp  squash  cheese  lettuce  cilantro  guacamole  mango pico and creamy chipolte sauce. All of this in a burrito  as tacos  in a bowl  in a salad  or as nachos. Clearly you must be wondering why I prefer this over say  Freebird s or Chipolte  And your answer is  sauteed zucchini  amp  squash  as well as mango pico. You see  at the other places my filling option to substitute meat are peppers  amp  onions....NO THANKS. And so I ve always been happy without anything extra  living life oblivious. But when you give me a real option other than nasty slimey pepper and onions as my filling  I have a hard time forgiving those other places for their lack of tasty filling substitutes.   In all fairness  I hear the fish  tilapia  tacos are fantastic here. They also have brisket  pork  chicken and beef fajita filling options. What also sets these guys apart are their salsas and sauce options. Delicious  vast options to  make your food spicy or less spicy  creamy chipolte is my go to . If you like sodas without the HFC then you will appreciate their unique soda options. Embrace the portion size and save some for later  this is my advice. I have yet to follow my own advice  but someday...someday.
My favorite place ever  even with a line literally out the door they move quickly while still maintaining a smile and being friendly  luv the food too

DO NOT DARE GO BACK TO CHIPOTLE  This place beats chipotle by a land slide  You get more here for less or the same price and the ingredients are WAAAAY tastier. The burritos are HUGE  the burrito bowls are DELICIOUS and the chips and queso are to DIE for. Please never go to chipotle again  if Cabo Bob s had as many locations as chipotle then chipotle would go out of business.. again.. I took off a star bc of how many times I had to detour myself to another restaurant bc Cabo closes at 10pm

In the West Campus area but don t want food you can get anywhere else   Head to Cabo Bob s   My coworkers very rarely add places they re willing to go for lunch  but Cabo Bob s made the list  We were SO happy that they added a West Campus location  now we go at least a couple times a month   To be honest  I really only get fish burritos at Cabo Bob s  but that s because they re so dang good. Every single time  the fried fish comes fresh out of the fryer and onto my burrito. Topped with mango pico  cilantro  cabbage  and black beans  the fried fish burrito   4  consistently satiates my appetite. The food combined with a clean seating area with TVs that show either SportsCenter or the Longhorn Network make Cabo Bob s the perfect spot for me to eat lunch and catch up with the sports news during my lunch hour.  ALSO  don t forget to grab a punch card next time you go. For every six entree items you purchase  you get one free entree item OR a Cabo Bob s tshirt. Personally  I just get the free burrito

Favorite place to eat  period. They have AMAZING meats  soooo many choices of tortilla and toppings to add to the food. The possibilities make it an exciting dining experience every time I go  That and the people are friendly  always ready to help you with your order. Give it a try  you WILL get hooked

Went here for the first time for dinner before 4th of July fireworks  Pork was delicious however I was really stoked for the mango pico and it just didn t do it for me.... it tasted very bland with little to no flavor at all. And it made my burrito terribly soggy by the time I was halfway through because they don t mix the fillers up. They just roll it in layers. That s a good way to ruin a seemingly great burrito. Also  most burrito places don t charge me for queso since I DONT eat beans  but they did  which was also kind of upsetting. I ll probably visit again and make some adjustments in my choices. Overall was an okay experience.

Today we had Taco Tuesday at our office and brought in lunch for our team from Cabo Bob s. It was fantastic  Everything was fresh and the variety of all of the salsas was exceptional. We ordered the chicken  steak and the brisket. All of it was cooked to perfection and our team could not be happier with the selection. The brisket practically melted in your mouth. If you have a group to feed  this was the way to go  Affordable and delicious. Can t wait for our next Taco Tuesday

First time eating at Cabo Bobs. I shared a bowl with my boyfriend. We really liked it. We got a brown rice bowl  with mixed beans  chicken and ground beef with bacon  queso  guac  roasted veggies  onions  and some other yummy stuff. I like this place better than chipotle but not better than Austin Burrito company in bee caves which unfortunately closed down recently    at least I found a place that is nearly as good that can replace it.
Love Cabo Bob s. Their burritos are huge  Enough for 2 meals. The ingredients are fresh and the food is good. Way better than Chipotle in my opinion.

CABO BOB S over CHIPOTLE all day   PLEASE OPEN A LOCATION IN HOUSTON  TX   I bookmarked this place prior to going to Austin because I wanted to get some good fish tacos. I came in on a Sunday with my boyfriend before we were heading back home to Houston. They offer many fresh combos including fish tacos  burritos  bowls  and salads. The set up is similar to Chipotle but even fresher and faster. The decor was very inviting and surfer-esque with lots of seating. I visited the Rio Grande location which had it s own private parking lot which was a plus.   I ordered the baja fish tacos which came on corn tortilla and my boyfriend ordered the fish tacos on flour. We both regret not getting a flavored fresh made tortilla so we will be coming back for sure. The fish was fried crisp to perfection and very fresh not greasy. There were plenty of toppings to choose from as well. The soda fountain also had some unique flavors which I loved.   I can t wait to come back to Cabo Bob s Burritos.

I was not expecting this place to live up to the hype.  I mean  it s just burritos right   Nope.  This place was great.  The tortillas are hand pressed in front of you and all the toppings are fresh.  I had the  7 and it was delicious...the steak was very tender and well seasoned.  Chips and salsa were freshly made as well  and equally tasty .  Well done Cabo Bob s...I will be back soon.

This place beats chipotle  free birds  and any other burrito place on taste hands down. They offer a huge variety of meats including chicken  steak  crispy fish  etc. I cannot stress how satisfying the burrito wrap is with four distinct and delicious varieties.  Finally  they offer old fashioned cane sugar filled soda s and a killer sweet mint tea. This is the first 5 star fast food-esque I have truly been to in many years.

We recently had Cabo Bob s cater our volunteer recognition party at Healing with Horses Ranch  and it was absolutely delicious. I was mad at myself for never having tried them before  Ingredients seemed very fresh and good quality  queso was amazing  and they were very easy to work with  Definitely recommend  whether it s just for a quick meal or a whole party
This place is super cool and the fish tacos are to die for    The line gets really long around the lunch hour so plan wisely.

Literally the best deal you can get if you re looking for a lot of great food at an affordable price. Seriously cannot recommend this place enough. Its literally Chipotle with better and more food for the same price.

Fast and friendly  but average fish tacos. However  they are more proud of their burritos which I did not sample and can not review. The atmosphere was nice with a patio  fans and a banana tree  Service was prompted. I could see how college students would enjoy the setting.

I visited Cabo Bob s on several occasions  however not often enough since they are about 20 miles away. I am always amazed at how good their food is. They start off with fresh tortillas and fresh ingredients. This place is what Chipotle wish it could be- good food at a great price.

Check it Bleed s  this place is hip.Lookie here. I can dig grease  n chompin  on some buns and draggin  through the garden. These Big Ass Burrito s are the PHIGGIDY BOMB  YO . They fill yo     up good  you be cryin . Da Smokey Cheddar tortilla  is da SHIZ  NITS  you know what I am sayin  WIGGA  Hey... knock a self a pro  Slick  That gray matter backlot perform us DOWN  I take TCB-in   man  Check it  The Mint Sweet tea........Oh man let me tell. Squeeze off 3 or 4 limes in the large to go drink cup  add 7 packs of pink sugar  pour in the Tea 3 4 way  add ice. By the time you finish that S mofo sucka  you ll be F   ED UP. So all you Crack     Crackers stop by da place to See Arnold and the gang and get yo grub on. Peace

I tore into these like Liam Neeson tears into people who steal his daughter.  Duuuuuuuude   Insane fresh hot tortillas made right in front of you.  Are you kidding me     These tacos are mouth watering.  I had I literally ordered four just so I could sit there and taste almost everything.  They re way too big for that nonsense  but you know what   I sat there staring at the four tacos and said   This is happening  and ate every one of them.
Walked in 5 minutes before close and they didn t treat me like the asshole I truly am. Wonderful burrito  even better customer service. 10 10 would recommend.

Great place  They have a wide variety of options - so they probably have something for you too. The employees are always pleasant  even when they have lines that go all the way outside  and are really helpful if you re not sure on what to get. All their options are great but I particularly enjoy their fish the most

Cabo Bob s definitely ranks in the upper echelon of burrito-destinations in Austin.  Unfortunately  this isn t saying much because Austin is somewhat of a burrito desert. Quality tacos  chalupas  enchiladas  rellenos and whatever-else abound in Austin  but for whatever reason  no establishment here has been able to replicate the quality burritos commonly found on the west coast.   Cabo Bob s may offer bit more novelty than Chipotle  but my body feels the exact same afterwards.   The brown rice at Cabo Bobs is undercooked  stiff  and most certainly won t be broken down by my body. Here s a pointer  Bob  cook your brown rice with a bit more water  and perhaps a bit longer.

Had heard a lot of great things around town about Cabo Bob s so we decided to stop in while we were at Breed  amp  Co. The staff was pleasant while we ordered a variety of different signature tacos.   I am from San Antonio and tacos are kind of our thing. These tacos were tasty but smothered in sauces and too much cabbage. Let the protein be the star  We must have come right after the rush because we could still see remnants on most of the tables. We will have to be back to try some different tacos because we owe Cabo Bob that much

Big Bland Burrito  Not sure what the hype is all about. The brisket needs flavor and the there is not much to the big burrito.   Also  wish the took care of new folks better instead of pushing them through the line. When I asked about the sauces they simply pointed me to the window that had their names on them.

This place is amazing  They make the tortillas in front of you at this rotating press machine  as soon as you tell them. You point and tell them what toppings you want  and the possibilities are endless  Fresh fish tacos  great steak  tasty chicken or vegetarian.  I ordered the brisket and asked to have everything  but the kitchen sink  Great for picky eaters. Their soda cups are so cool and durable  I take it home with me...

Man o man I love me some Cabo Bobs  Unfortunately this isn t yet a national chain but it should be. It s my burrito go to in Austin  they make their own tortillas while you wait  try the fish tacos  also their steak is so good  this place is so much better than Chipotle or Qdoba. Mmmmm I get hungry just thinking about it. Give it a try

This place is better than chipotle  in my opinion   amp  amp  that s a big statement because chipotle is amazing. This is like the same food creation process but more choices...delicious choices.  One thing that you have to get is the fish tacos or just anything with the fish    Another thing is they have different types of flour  more variety of toppings  and more sauces. The fried fish is seasoned incredibly and I love it. There s even stuff like mango salsa   I just wish this place had more locations and closer to the UT campus

From freshly made tortillas to fish just out of the fryer  every ingredient from start to finish in my Baja fish tacos was very fresh  Staff was incredibly friendly and helpful as well and parking is definitely not an issue. For about  8 for 3 amazingly delicious fish tacos  I d say Cabo Bob s is beyond compare.
They have really great service and you cant beat the location  Friendly staff and really fresh ingredients.

I finally caved and came here after all of my friends pestered me about it. Needless to say  I don t think I ll ever go to Chipotle again. Now don t get me wrong- Chipotle is phenomenal but the fish tacos at Cabo Bob s are to die for. Crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside  their crispy fish perfectly complements the sweet and spicy tang from the rest of the taco. Also  the service was great  Everyone was so friendly and the atmosphere was great  So glad I came here

I can t rave enough about this place.  We frequently order this for our office  and the tortillas are always soft and fresh and the chicken is so yum  And you have to try the spicy ranch sauce  orange in color -- I literally cover everything in the sauce.  To me  it is like an upgraded Chipotle with fresher ingredients and tasty sides.

A definite step up from freebird chipotle. It has the same fast-casual business model but the ingredients are much  much fresher and much more inspired.  If you re tired of hearing  wheat or white tortilla  at your burrito bar  then you re going to love this place. To start you off   they change things up by offering you buttermilk-flour or cilantro-spice tortillas  or another less-interesting option I forgot . They then build the burrito in front of you with the typical ingredients  each one of them jazzed up in some way.  And jazzed up they were. You can actually taste the difference. The beef fajita meat option is particularly flavorful--I definitely recommend. They go a little heavy on the beans and rice  but ultimately it turns out to be a pretty good burrito. The vegetables are particularly noteworthy for their freshness. I thought I was eating a salad.
Need to be full for 5 hours  Cabo Bob s is perfect. I usually get the beef or fish  but you can t go wrong
I m a fish taco snob. This place has the best I ve ever had   And it s fun to watch them make the tortillas. It s also my 14year old s most requested restaurant  And weLOVE their hot sauce too
YUM. This might be the best kept secret in town. And it s hiding in plain sight  The food is amazing and the queso  ROCK    Great environment. Great prices for the amount of food  YUM.

Fish. Burrito. Get this.   So thankful they made a central location. Been twice so far  and the service and food have both been fantastic. Plenty of seating and TVs for watching sports  There s a lot of outdoor seating as well.   Really  little must be said about Cabo Bob s because their burritos are the disco pants of all burrito chains in Austin. Come here. They have a frequent eater card too  Six meals gets you a free burrito or a CB s tshirt.

Clean  right-priced and  best of all  good food. I tried the fish tacos with no complaint. Next time will ask if they have a not fried option. My friend had a HUGE burrito--took half home to his wife. He s a fan of chipotle  and says this was fresher and better variety.   The manager  Arnold  I think  stopped by our table. He was genuinely friendly and has the attitude to make this place succeed  imo. Friendly staff too.

One of the best places to eat in Austin  period. I used to frequent Freebird s all the time  but Cabo Bob s has completely stolen that position and will probably keep it forever.  I mean really  tortillas that are freshly cooked right in front of you  high quality meat  home made chips  really good queso  and real sugar soda fountains  It s absurdly good.

Why anyone still goes to Chipotle I don t know  This place is SO much better and faster   Their tortillas are amazing and freshly pressed when you re going down the line  so no more cardboard tortillas  They also have great flavors like cilantro tomatillo that really do make your food better.  Their ingredients are a lot fresher than Chipotle s  their fajita steak is always cooked perfectly and it never dry  They have great sauces that you can add to your burrito for free and their guac is a lot better too    The employees are also super nice and friendly. They give great portions and are really helpful when you re deciding.   I ll never be going back to Chipotle  I m in and out of this place within 10 minutes
This is my favourite burrito place for sure   You get to pick the flavour of the tortilla  which is amazing   Plus they give you soooo much food  Highly recommend the cilantro tomatillo tortillas
Probably the only legit mission style burrito I ve had in Austin people are cool  let me walk in with my pup to order  very friendly  and the tortillas are off the hook

So delicious  If you want a mouth watering burrito then please go to cabo bobs  Their chips and salsa is a must try and their service is fast and efficient  And the fish tacos are a delicious healthy alternative  Highly recommend

Every time my friends are in town they come straight here and get it for breakfast  lunch  and dinner. Insanely fresh  warm  good food  You will never be satisfied from chipotle once you ve got a whif of the yumminess that is Cabo
Tortillas made fresh in front of you  nice vibe  great crowd  very welcoming  and food is great. I d recommend the deluxe fish tacos.

When I first tried this I was shocked that it wasn t as popular as Chipotle. There s plenty of seating inside  and the atmosphere is very peaceful. They have fish as one of the options  and that s something you rarely find in Mexican restaurants. Everything just tastes fresh  and that s what I love about this place

The main attraction of Cabo Bob s is definitely the fresh tortillas. You ve got 4 choices - flour  chili  cheese  and cilantro. The flour is a classic - boring  I know  but it s there for a reason. The chili is okay  it s not spicy or anything. You can get pretty much whatever you want in your burrito bowl taco. They have fish here  which is something you don t find at most places. Beware of getting it in a burrito - it will probably lose its crispiness due to all of the other ingredients. With a bowl or taco  it fares much better  since the pieces are usually put at the top. Other ingredients are pretty much standard.  I ve been here twice now  and I ve had pretty different experiences. The first time was great - no problems ordering  and the food was tasty. The second time  and probably my last time  it was quite a pain. Due to a language barrier  the person making my burrito put the things I _didn t_ want on my burrito. It got fixed  but it was quite a wait to get it remade since they were low on fish and had to fry up some more. Ugh  these things shouldn t happen. The burrito wasn t even good. I like Chipotle more - they are at least consistent.

Best chips and queso...Best. Their tacos and burrito s are really delicious too  Way better than free birds and waaay better than chipotle.  Try Cabo Bob s and I doubt you will ever visit the other two again   Oh yeah  a major big deal...there is always soccer on one of their TVs...instant arrow to my heart.

The food here is absolutely amazing. It s so delicious. There s parking available  which is a godsend here in West Campus   and there s plenty of seating for small and large groups. There are lots of options here  so everyone will have something they ll be able to order and enjoy. I personally get the fish burrito in a cheddar tortilla every single time I come  and it s the best burrito I ve ever had. Everything tastes super fresh  and the pico de gallo with mango is fantastic.   It s well priced too  and for  7 you get a massive burrito that tastes great and is absolutely worth the trek down to the north side of Guad. You won t regret it

Stopped in on Moving Saturday in West Campus.  We must have gotten lucky because we found parking near the door and a very short line.  The staff was friendly and the food was great.   The atmosphere was good.  I would certainly return in the future
Grubbed on fish tacos  2 and it definitely hit the spot. Thanks cabo bob s  Your tacos rock and so fresh

This is the best burrito place that I have experienced in Austin  The amount of options at this place is awesome. The fresh tortillas with different flavors is the selling point at least in my book.  Fast. Friendly. Delicious. Decently priced.  I am a regular for sure here. Love it sooo much  Turned my whole family onto this place and we all couldn t rave about it more

Cabo Bob s catered our company lunch on May 3rd and it was out of this world delicious   I will definitely plan to stop by and dine in person.  I loved the flavors and the presentation.  We all are voting to have y all back soon
It s good. Maybe more like 3.5 stars. Got the  2 to  go. Tortillas are nice. Tastes fine overall - nothing spectacular. Worked in a quick pinch lunch. Expected more flavor out of the sauces.

I got a burrito  and it was quite bland. The rice was hard and flavorless. The meat and limited add-ins were not very flavorful. I will say that the tortillas were fresh and tasty  but overall you can get much better burritos from places such as chipotle or freebirds for the same price.

Awesome place for some delicious quick food. Lots of options for the whole family. The fresh made tortillas add that extra something and the fajita meat is great. I love all the topping options and the cane sugar soda or mint tea to drink.

I ve given Chipotle 5 stars and I think Cabo Bob s is even better. The tortillas are made fresh to order. I ve tried all 4 flavors but ancho chili is my favorite. The meat is good quality. There s a ton of sauce choices. Food is reasonably priced    7  and they have stamp cards for returning customers.

I got a free burrito because of my last review  That s so nice of Cabo Bob s  thank you   I come here AT LEAST once a week. The punch card system has treated me so well. Since my last review  I indeed have had the fish tacos and I cannot return to anything else. There is nothing better than getting fish fresh from the frier on your tacos.  Mas pescado  por favor   is the best thing to hear when you are near the end of the line.  Furthermore  the staff at this location is just great  They all seem so focused  at ease  and even friendly despite the massive waves of customers they get.   Cabo Bob s is just the best food place to happen to West Campus because of their good prices  true high-quality ingredients  and it being a truly respectable business.
I need you Cabo Bobs on Sunday s.... You are the only cure to the worst of hangovers and the burrito urges. Pleaseeeeeeee

Wonderrrrfuuullll    I finally went after my coworker kept bragging on them  it was everything he said  Fresh tortillas  wide variety of toppings  CLEAN   I love it      But don t take my word  Go check it out yourself. The Manager was very friendly and funny and also offered us punch cards that you only have to use like 6 times in order to get something free    winning
I like this place. they have great burritos  great tortillas they make in front of you. give it a try if your wanting Mexican fast food with a good quality.

This place is awesome  Not exactly a hole-in-the-wall joint but it beats alot of those Mexican chain restaurants. You order like a Chipotle style service where you go down the line and choose your ingredients. However  I can immediately tell that the sauce and ingredients are fresh and the portions are about the same as Chipotle.  If you like that kind of Mexican food this place is awesome. They also have bottled soda which tastes way better than those fountain drinks. I ordered  6 which is a Brisket with Cheese Burrito with rice  beans  sour cream  lettuce  salsa  etc.  you can choose your own ingredients . They also have a punch card with every 7th meal free or you get a T-shirt.  Thank god for this place  it s my new favorite Mexican hot spot

The food here is amazing. I am not a huge fan of Chipotle or Qdoba.  They offer a good variety of options for a pretty good price.  I really like the fact that we can choose our own flavor of tortilla and even combine some flavors.  The veggies are standard but they offer brisket and fried fish for the meat filling  which are amazing. I would recommend 10 10.

Reviewed by my 7 year old daughter  this was the best restaurant I have ever been to. We love the tacos so much. My sister likes the big round table. My dad ate a huge burrito in about two minutes. The people were really nice. I would like to go there every day if I could

Out of all the nearby places in west campus  Cabo Bob s is the best  The staff is really friendly and polite. Every time I go  the ingredients are always fresh and the tortillas are perfect. The variety is astounding. The fish burrito is my new favorite burrito. Just when you think they can t get any better  they also have a rewards card so that every 7th burrito or tacos combo you purchase is free  I recommend Cabo s for everyone

Honestly  cabo bobs was actually pretty good. The burrito is pretty much the biggest meal I ve ever Been served in my life and the brisket was pretty tasty. Better than freebirds  absolutely  better than chipotle  Absolutely. Chipotle is not hard to beat  it s always uneventful. Better salsas and more flavor here.   ridiculously cheap
As a self proclaimed connoisseur of burritos  I bestow the award of best burrito in Austin to my friends at Cabo Bob s.  Wonderful establsihment.

These burritos were HUGE and so so yummy. Way more flavor and way more food than chipotle for the same price  I am vegan and got the veggie burrito and it was a 10 10 and lasted me like 3 meals. Definitely worth a visit

I am in town for the day visiting my friend who goes to UT and I was hungry after driving all the way from Dallas. Looked up this place and decided to order online. My order was ready right when it said it was gonna be ready and the customer service was great. The food would be overpriced if it was Chipotle  but this ain t not Chipotle. I m gonna have some dreams about this burrito tonight. 10 10

This is my new go-to place  My last 3x at chipotle have been sucky so I started coming here and they never fail to impress me with the quality of food and quick service  The fresh tortillas are amazing  I always get a steak burrito  The brisket is also awesome  Everything is great here. You can t go wrong with any choice

Cabo Bob s is all about the freshly-made tortillas and expanse of flavors that puts Chipotle to shame. It costs roughly the same for a Chipotle-style mega burrito but it definitely tastes much better because of the fresher ingredients. If you want to get a bowl however  Chipotle definitely has larger portion sizes for those.  I usually get the  5 Pork Burrito since I don t really need to have queso for every meal  it is delicious however . Their brisket is surprisingly good  especially considering how snobby Texas makes one when it comes to BBQ. I also really enjoy the Ancho Chili Tortilla that is freshly pressed and cooked as you order.   The fountain drinks are all pure cane sugar sodas including the fantastic Maine Root Doppelg nger  so be warned you namebrand drinkers    They also have a loyalty program that gives you a free burrito  or t-shirt   for every six that you buy. That works out to each burrito costing  1 less in the long run  if you re counting .  If you want something like Chipotle and don t want to walk to Chipotle  then this is a great alternative.

I love this place. Awesome burritos  tacos  etc. And the tortillas are made to order  There are 4 different flavors you can choose from  smoky cheddar  buttermilk  ancho chili and cilantro tomatillo. I went with the cilantro tomatillo with white rice  chicken and queso cheese for an extra 99 cents   so worth it . Then I loaded it up with veggies  sour cream  salsa and chipotle crema sauce. Sodas are also really unique  and they re made with pure sugar cane  The only reason why I left 4 stars is b c they skimped a bit on my chicken. Aside from that  I can t really complain. One of the best burritos I ve had in a long time  and I m glad they re closer to campus. The other location was a trek  especially during rush hour traffic.  Great place to hang out with friends  and they have tons of outdoor seating

Had my first Cabo Bobs experience today. Fresh  tasty  and quick food that I ll definitely be back for. There was definitely a lunch rush and what really made today s experience great was the over the top customer service from Arnold  who truly knows how to run a restaurant  Thank you Arnold and your team for a fantastic meal

Always fresh  amp  delicious. The staff is always very friendly and quick in the line  while still being very attentive to your needs  . I d say it is better than chipotle and definitely better than freebirds.   Of course I feel like every burrito place could have a few more topping options but they still have enough to make a delicious chicken bowl
Delicious fresh food and awesome service. The environment is laid back island music   Lots of service men and women in there great place to find your dream spouse and enjoy a delicious meal

If I could give Cabo Bob s 10 stars  I would. Cabo Bob s is the best burrito place near UT. So many ingredient choices  and no matter what you choose  you can t go wrong. If you haven t had Cabo Bob s  you haven t lived.

Just as good as the other location. So  excellent. I recommend the fish with mango pico  cabbage  lime juice  and whatever else you want. Cabo Bob s is beyond any other burrito place in town.   At this location  the parking lot can get congested at peak times.

I don t know how I lived in west campus for 4 years without ever trying Cabo Bob s  but I am eternally grateful for finally being introduced  The meat is so flavorful  the service is fast  the price is certainly worth it  and the tortillas are delicious. I always get the bowl with pork and 2 small cilantro tortillas on the side because they re just amazing.

Great spot for your burrito fix  I d consider this a notch above Freebird s  although I still love Freebird s. There are different choices here than Freebird s though  various grilled veggies  fish   and they press and cook the tortillas to order. The fajita meats are nice and smoky  especially the beef. The chicken was a tad dry. I ordered the fish burrito for myself  topped with shredded cabbage and mango salsa. I can t tell you how much I loooove mango salsa  so this did not disappoint. The burritos are about  8 and the size of a small child  so I d say you get a great deal for the amount of food you receive. The fish is fried and not fishy at all  but decently seasoned. I am happy I tried C.B.s and look forward to having it again.

I like that I can create my own burrito online and go pick it up  I haven t tried too many things from here other than the fish. My friend says the chicken is moist and flavorful. They have a large selection of salsa s and hot sauces. The prices are reasonable  I will continue to use this as a work lunch option.

As if this place needs any more good reviews  but here I go.   I ve been getting my burrito fix here since the first location opened down south. Chipotle and Qdoba are no longer part of my vocabulary. My go-to order  Number 10 veggie burrito all the way. Even my carnivore friends agree it s the bomb. If I wasn t a starving college student I would be here everyday drinking Dublin Dr. Pepper and eating fresh pressed tortillas.

This place is really good    It is similar to Chipotle where you can get tacos  burritos  salads  bowls  and mix and match with beans  pico  salsa  rice  lettuce  cheese  guacamole  etc.   You pick a type of tortilla which is cooked from dough form to fresh tortillas right in front of your eyes  Pick any toppings and top it off with a variety of sauces. It is delicious and fresh  I got the crispy fish and beef fajita. They have pure cane sugar soda with interesting flavors like squeeze orange soda or doppelg nger soda and not your traditional coke or pepsi products.  Tip  Using the UMeTime Application you can get 2 tacos  chips and queso  and a drink for only  5.99

Cabo bobs is the definition of chipotle on steroids. Only if you re a burrito or taco eater though. The bowls are average and I feel like chipotle would give you way more.   The burritos and tacos though... There s just something about freshly made tortillas. And with that alone it beats chipotle by strides. Try the fried fish tacos

Soooo good. I come for lunch  and either people don t realize that it is here yet  or I miss the lunch rush  since I have never had to stand in a long line like the one on Ben White.  I get the salad and tacos with chicken and the fixings. I have an internal battle every time deciding on whether or not to be good and get the salad  or make my mouth really happy and get the tacos

Fresh pressed and grilled tortillas  a rather large selection of everything  nice fresh veggies  totally unique soda fountain. If you want a lot of choices when you re getting a burrito  this is the place for you. No matter what you order  you will be served a mountain of food.  Decor is a little bland  with a corrugated-steel and vague surf theme.  Music is not great.  Recommended. I predict this will be a longer-lasting restaurant in this space than most of the others in recent memory  if they keep up the quality of the food.
The tortillas are prepared fresh in front of you. They fill them as you want them.  The result is nothing but wonderful.

Dear God  honey mint tea  the yummiest bowls and mango salsa  and Gluten Free.  Only thing better that could happen at this place if they had a live simulator to ride a wave on their groovy beach themed decor.  Fan-freaking-tastic.

There s two one-way roads between California and Austin. The breakfast taco and the cali-style burrito. Honestly  I don t care if Californicators get breakfast burritos. What I do miss about living  briefly  in California are the vegetable burritos. Hey  Freebirds is great  but there aren t any VEGETABLES in their veggie burritos. Enter Cabo Bob s. Love  love  love the veggie burrito. Really  all it needs is more veggies. Carrots  broccoli  mushrooms  and other stuff.  The staff are super nice  they have Maine Root soda-pops  this one is conveniently located near head shops and boutique hardware stores.  Tip  one burrito will feed two people.

The staff here is so friendly and helpful  they really know their stuff   Menu is overwhelming with choices  and since I am not used to building my own burrito I really needed help. Their number items are all good  my mom especially liked the fish burrito. The mint iced tea is sweetened  we loved it. They also have unsweetened which none of us cared to try. All the burritos are loaded  one of my friends had their veggie and really enjoyed it.  They also have a stamp card  buy 6 and get a free burrito or shirt. We love their food and would rather just pay them for it and take a corny shirt back to Massachusetts as a souvenir.
Enjoyed the fish burrito. Same concept as chipotle but more variety of meat and tortillas. Fast and inexpensive meal if you re looking for a quick bite.

I have been to Cabo Bob s a million times and not sure why I have not written a review. For those that don t know me I have been in the restaurant business for 20 years. I am very picky on not just food but over all experience and service. This place is clean top to bottom. Fresh scratch food. Service wonderful. I like walking in and them remembering what I like. All the details are met here. Do yourself a favor and go in and enjoy a perfect dining experience.
Awesome food with a great value  Probably went 4-5 times the month I found out about it.

The  Best Beef Burrito  was not that at all... Other than the fact that the tortilla is huge so it makes for a massive burrito  I don t get the hype. They were skimpy on the beef but put tons of rice  and it was very bland. The staff was so quick  some of them forgot their customer service skills and manners. I also feel like it was overpriced  I paid almost  12 for one tasteless burrito and a Mexican coke.

Super amazing    It has a wide selections of different ingridients compared to Chipotle but it definetely doesnt dissapoint at all  I highly recommend it over any other place like it  They are super freindly and the different flavor tortillas for their burritos are awesome  All their grilled veggies are awesome too  high quality meat as well

I like this place sooo much   Flavor is on point  Vegan friendly   I love ordering take out   One complaint -- seems like there is too much oil used to cook the simplest things  rice  amp  beans.  Flavor is so good  the extra lip balm won t stop me from going.   truthtelling lol

This is my favorite place to get some good food. The staff are friendly  the food is always on point  and fairly priced. Sometimes there s a long queue for food  and I believe that it s because they re so good. Will definitely continue to go here
Great place for fish tacos and fish burritos. They use freshly made tortillas  3 different kinds to choose from . The mango salsa is also a must try here.

The burritos served at Cabo Bob s are probably the biggest burritos I have ever seen  I like that they have ancho chili tortillas. Very different than any other place around. I have only ordered Cabo Bob s on favor once  so I didn t get to see the inside however  I drive past it every day and it looks like a great little restaurant to hang in. I also ordered their queso and it was just okay. Not the best I have ever had  but not too bad either. I ordered the brisket burritto and it was pretty tasty. I wish people who made burritos would mix it up better though. I don t want a mouthful of sauce and lettuce with no brisket  but beggars can t be choosers. Not sure what all the hype is about surrounding this place. It was good  but not fabulous. Maybe it was an off day. Their prices are very fair though. I will be back to try something different.

Best food ever they make tortillas fresh as ordered and the ingredients look fresh as could be not to mention the authentic house made hot sauce to top the wonderfully prepared melody of taste about to be consumed  well I made myself hungry can t wait till they open tomorrow

Best quick service Tacos and Burritos in Austin. Do yourself a favor  buy a bag of their chips. Take the bag home and leave it sit over night  then enjoy. Seriously the chips are the best but even better after a day in a bag  You re welcome

Some of the best burritos tacos I ve ever had  and definitely the best fast food fast casual restaurant I ve ever been to. The fillings are good quality ingredients  the fish is amazing  plus there s a great selection of sauces and tortillas. One of the first places I will recommend to someone in Austin.
This place s food is incredibly delicious  I also really like that their sodas are so unique and made with real cane sugar.   Their fish tacos are my fave and their queso is amazing

The best burrito I ve ever had. It was massive and made more than a couple meals for me. Absolutely delicious food and fresh ingredients and more than worth it for the price. This will be my go-to burrito place in Austin from now on. And the customer service was stellar. Love Cabo Bob s

We got a group order here at work.  I got a bowl with fish and all the veggie options I could grab.  Topped with Chipotle sauce.  It was truly excellent and HUGE    Last time I had Cabo Bob s it was their Ben White store some years ago  sometimes it was great  other not so great   so I am glad they were doing well enough to open another location to continue with their unique offerings.

Cabo Bob s is my new favorite place to get a burrito. The ingredients are fresh and they even make the tortillas right in front of you. They also have four different kinds of tortillas that can be mixed together. In addition  you can t go wrong with a side of quest or getting their tacos.

I really liked this place  The burritos are big and cheesy  and I like that you aren t required to pick from a menu of burritos full of veggies and things I don t want. My only complaint is that the rice is full of some lettuce thing that prefer not to have. Overall  I love these burritos

I ordered online to be picked up. As I pull up around 11 40ish am... I see the parking lot packed already. I see a couple guys headed out so I pull in a lil closer to their vehicle. As I am parking  I see a huge white Suburban like vehicle  on my rear view mirror. Both the driver and passenger are sticking their fingers at me. I am like  I saw them parked just sitting there no signal light no nothing.  probably on their phones  So  I get in to get my order then I see a long line. I  go to the cashier station and they told me I didn t have to wait. I didn t notice no signs about To Go orders but it will be helpful. I wished they would have a To Go Parking as well. My friend wished there was another way to keep her corn tortilla on her fish tacos from falling apart  Got wet.  And for those A  Wipes that stuck their fingers out.. Jokes on them bc I was in  amp  out in like 3 min. meanwhile they were stuck behind that long line all cowardly hiding.... HAAA
Why go to Chipotle or Qdoba when Cabo Bob s exists  Their tortilla choices are incredible and all fillings meat are always fresh. Great queso too.

I had the  7 steak burrito and loved it even though I don t normally do burrito places. I keep looking at their menu and trying to decide what to eat next. Restaurant was nice and clean  had a good vibe to it  food was great. Definitely stopping by again soon.

Story time... A friend and I decided to go to one of our fav burrito spots on a beautiful Saturday. As I was perfecting my order  I was interrupted by a workers negative attitude. She then proceeded to toss my friends salsa towards him opposed to gently handing it over. I assume she did this because my pal upset her by ordering such a massive burrito. Nonetheless  I enjoyed my time at Cabo bobs today eating and watching playoff basketball. Will return

Tried all of their tortillas and was amazed on the great flavor they added to the over all experience. Very friendly staff that helps out with decisions if you are debating on what to get. Been now twice since coming to Austin and recommend everyone trying them out new to the area.

It s a great burrito place  I had the burrito bowl  but I thought it was just as good as any other place for a burrito bowl  I really appreciate how they make their own tortillas  so delicious  To sum it up  there wasn t anything special about the bowl.

I love Cabo Bobs.. where to start  The homemade tortillas are made before your very eyes soon to be followed by an exemplary array of offerings including fish. I always come here when I need a serious munchie fix and they have never failed me. The staff are some of the most pleasant people which makes the experience even more enjoyable. If you haven t eaten here or at their south location  yet  you need to  5 stars.

This is probably one of my favorite places to go. I go to Cabo Bob s at least once a week  and sometimes multiple times a week. My favorite thing by far is to get fish tacos with cilantro tomatillo tortillas  and then just add my own personal combination of toppings on. Their ingredients are fresh and delicious  and their drinks are great. I love a mixture of the sweet mint tea with their lemonade. I would definitely recommend coming here and trying to everyone

The owner had messaged me and apologized for the experience I had and made it right for me. I was back in Austin and decided to check out Cabo Bob s again. The burrito was absolutely perfect. A  for customer service and A    for food quality. THANK YOU
Great tortillas and toppings  So much better than moes and chipotle. Just be prepared that the line goes fast so you need to know what you want

More of a 3.5 than a 4. Though I really really enjoyed the burrito I had it was pretty much falling apart because there was too much stuffing inside of it. It was the  4 Fish Burrito that I ordered. Despite my disappointment of it falling apart I recognize greatness whenever I see it. The burrito tasted flavorful and fresh. Will be returning  though I m hoping the burrito won t fall apart next time. Edit  I returned here the burrito I had didn t fall apart and it tasted even better than the first time. I absolutely loved it  So now this is more of a 4 star. Edit  Now I just love this place so 5 stars. My go to place for burritos. So glad I gave this place another chance since the first time I went here was literally my worst experience I had with them.
Pretty good for my first time visit.  I had a fajita steak burrito and it was much better than Chipotle.  The limited parking kinda sucks though.

I was pretty excited to try this place and had a good reason to as I had a buy one get one free coupon.  Yes  it s great that they make their tortillas to order. They have quite a bit of choices too for fillings  sauces and condiments.  I think I had either brisket or pork and I got queso and something else in it.  Honestly  it was pretty underwhelming.  I m not sure if I just muddled the flavor too much or not but I was hoping the counter person would ve steered me in the right direction but sadly  I just had paid nearly  20 for a bogo free burrito and a soda or something stupid like that.  Needless to say  I m in no rush to go back.  I should also point out that I m not a nut about burritos.

I have only been here twice  considering the fact that  sadly  I do not live in Austin  but both times have been super satisfying. I appreciate Cabo Bob s efforts towards serving fresh food  because when you get your bowl and or burrito  all that freshness combined is pleasing. The place itself is clean and the employees are nice  An upgrade from Chipotle  perhaps.

I will definitely be giving them another shot after hearing from one of the managers  Great customer service   Changed my 1 star to 4  will change to 5 after I try it again   amp  hopefully love it     Previous post  Pork tacos are terrible   Covered  amp  dripping in orange  amp  yellow grease. Tortilla is soaked in grease too  it is orange  amp  yellow as well.  There is about 2 ounces of grease  in the foil left over. Did they spoon in extra grease
This place rocks. I love the real cane sugar sodas from the fountain. The humongous burrito tasted great. I will return. At lunch they had a line but it moved quickly.

Cabo Bob s recently catered an event for us at UT Austin and did an excellent job.  The taco bar  pork  chicken  and vegetarian   was a hit with all the attendees and the staff was great to work with for the event.  Thank you for the first class service and delicious food.
This place is very fresh and unique  They offer a wide variety of burritos  tortillas  and ingredients that Chipotle can t touch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a filling meal

Love that they opened this location  much closer to where I live. Consistently great food  fish tacos on buttermilk tortillas are my jam  and friendly service. I also see the owners in this location a lot  behind the counter or talking to customers. It s great that they get so involved in the daily operations. One of my favorite places in Austin
Better than chipotle. Enough said. Good flavorful meat and the cheese tops it off perfectly  I would pick this over Qdoba and chipotle. It s also a pretty nice place to sit in and eat with friends.
Excellent fish burrito. Great price. Nuff said  Good atmosphere. Would be nice if they had beer. But nobody s perfect  -
I recommend fish tacos on fresh tortillas topped with cilantro  jalape os  guacamole  and mango pico.

Go to the Ben White location  this one has flies flying EVERYWHERE. I won t be back to this specific location  it kinda ruined my perception on Cabo Bob s but I m sure I ll forget and go back to the other location.

Cabo Bob s has to be the best burrito place in town. From the fresh tortillas to all the great fillings  this place rocks.  To start  there are multiple flavors of tortillas to choose from that get pressed and cooked as you order   As for the fillings  they have the standard fare for burrito places but they also have fish available  something you won t get at similar spots.  I love Cabo Bob s and would recommend it to anyone.
SO GOOD. Super fresh and always friendly staff. Sometimes there will be a long line  because it s good food AND close to campus   however  they re very good at keeping the line going.

This place is freakin awesome  I used to drive from Round Rock all the way to the Ben White location just for the fish tacos if that gives you any idea of how delicious they are. Now just I trek the location on Rio Grande    The tortillas  fish  salsas  etc. are fresh  the folks behind the line are nice  and I honestly can t think of a bad experience in the many times I ve been to either location. They also have pure cane sugar sodas which just adds to the cravings for this place.  My only suggestion to the business is to open a location up north

Came here on a nurse s recommendation at the hospital that I was just in for four days. Oh my....what wonderful fish tacos. I tried each kind of the tortillas and all are highly recommended. I wish they had a grilled fish option but the breading is light so no real complaint. Yummy

Solid eats...I enjoy the fish tacos and fish burrito  when I m real hungry .  Fresh  flavorful ingredients in tacos and burritos that are made-to-order result in a great tasting meal.  The spicy BBQ sauce is mouth watering and sweat inducing....  While it is similar to Chipotle  Qdoba  and others....it is different  and in my opinion  better
These burritos have to be the best combination of fresh tortillas and fillings in town..  Chipolte and Freebirds don t even come close..

Love me some cabo bobs. Although I normally always get a salad I always order a side of their smoked cheddar tortilla  DELICIOSO   OH and their sweet mint tea is a must for me  super refreshing.  Everything is fresh and the meat is tasty  Our office comes frequently  we definitely love it here.
Absolutely amazing  first find here and hands down never doing chipotle or free birds again . Awesome service . Guy who s worked there 4 years that served me is outstanding   Props

The BEST burritos on west campus. From the specialty  in-house made tortillas to the delicious hot sauce  mango salsa  and queso this place is always a delight to eat. The customer service is spectacular and I love the local drink selection on their fountain. The restaurant is beautiful and well conceived. There is a reason I make a point of eating here once a week.
WOOOOOW  this place is delicious. I went here yesterday and I ordered queso nachos with onions  chicken  and jalape os. I must go back the next time I come to Austin. This place is a winner

Cabo s is a great alternative to Chipotle or Freebird s. I ve had the burrito and salad  both are great  I like that Cabo s has more options for toppings than other places. They also serve a variety of seafood proteins if you are into that. Cool atmosphere too.

It s so amazing that in a 2 day trip  Hubby and I are already addicted. I can t believe that we don t have this place in Dallas. I will be craving these burritos when I am at home  and helped further sway my law school decision. The ingredients  fresh  the employees  friendly  the burrito beyond OFF THE CHAIN   . The flavors in each component is well thought out  and the combinations of flavors are just mind blowing. The Mango Pico is so good that I could eat a bowl full  and the Baja beans  just magnificent.
