Kudos to Cabo Bob s for sharing these recipes with Texas. I ll be dreaming for you tonight

The atmosphere is really relaxed with some cool decor.  All the food is really fresh and really tasty.  The prices are great for the amount of food you get.  We can t wait to come back here.  This place is pretty loud so keep that in mind if you want to get done good talking done.

I CAN NOT EVEN TELL YOU HOW EXCITED I AM     That they opened a place in the city. We always had to drive down south and now we have one in our back yard     They will be seeing more of us    I just wish all the money i spend there would go towards stocks     Love their food.
Great quality food. One of my favorite places to go. Facility could be managed better but staff is always helpful and friendly.
Good tacos  but the portions are structured for men. You can t order any less than 3 tacos at a time. I feel horrible about throwing away half my food...so I don t eat here.

Literally the worst experience of my life. I found 3 cockroaches in my burrito and my girlfriend broke up with me on the restaurant. The bathroom had no toilet paper when I had to go number two  and I got a grain of rice stuck in between my two front teeth. I don t recommend this place.

I was so excited to see that Cabo Bobs opened another location  and its close to my office. I am officially obsessed with this place. Chipotle cream and queso are absolute musts. This location doesn t seem to be busy yet. Hurry up and check out this place before it gets as crowded as the other location
Delicious  I m not a huge fan of burrito type places but this place is so good  I get the fish burrito on the cilantro tomatillo tortilla. Do it. You ll be thankful.

High quality ingredients  Flavors are better than Chipotle. It s locally owned  and they have three locations now. The owners are very nice and hard-working     The restaurant stays really busy  but the lines move at a good pace. They are excellent to use for catering for large groups. I ve used them many times  and they are always prompt and there are no mistakes with the order. I highly recommend Cabo Bob s

Sooo much better than Chipotle or Qdoba  The tortilla is cooked and pressed right in front of you  they offer more ingredients that are fresher  and the customer service is great. If you haven t been to Cabo Bob s yet you need to GO

This is absolutely one of my favorite places. It is similar to Freebirds and Chipotle. Both of which are good imo. However this place blows my mind. So Beach Bum bob will make you a burrito. You choose the stuff and he piles it in. Everything tastes fresh and has a good taste. The hot sauce they offer is mouth burning delicious. The cane sugar sodas are a great add on. I love the cream soda. I dont fall in love with too many places but I love cabo bobs. I hate to write this review because this location is not as busy and I can get my food quick. But like Bob would say  share the love bro . Thanks Bob

So far one of my favorite burrito places in Austin. It s a franchise  but there are a lot of options and overall  the food is fresh. It s slightly cheaper than chipotle and qdoba  which are it s competitors  but the concept of the restaurant is the same.

The best  build your own  burrito place in Austin. The owner is a great guy  and their staff is awesome. But it s their ingredients that set them apart from other places like Freebirds or Chipotle. Their mesquite grill does wonders on their meats  and the fried fish and fresh made tortillas are my favorite. Mostly the food can be 5 stars but sometimes it can be 4 stars. But it is delish no matter what.
Best burritos Ever in Austin. Super fresh ingredients. The made to order tortillas are so good. My B F and I split it in 3rds. Will never do burritos anywhere else. Awesome soda fountain too.

I LOVE CABO BOB S    This place is WAY better than Chipotle because their meat is more fresh and tender and they have QUESO   The tortillas are fresh  warm like you want and they try their hardest to be efficient and fast  which is why I will wait even if there s a line out the door. I love this place
Cabo has the best burritos in Austin. The fresh flavored tortilla does it for me. They are always polite  quick  and consistent. I will prefer a burrito from here over Chipotle or Qdoba any day.

Great variety in toppings veggies and tortillas are pressed fresh right before your eyes. Very good selection of sauces and beverages as well. Great  deliciously affordable burritos  bowls  and tacos.

This is a great and awesome place for Vegetarians. This place beats Chipotle  free birds when it comes to options for veggies. They have great and friendly staff who are the best. I would have this 2-3 days of the week without getting bored.

very fresh and flavorful.  i love that they have fish options too and your tortillas are freshly grilled.  the options are endless   the quality good.  beef was tender.  fish was crispy.  AND.. the price was very reasonable.
Pretty damn solid. It s amazing that it took people so long to beat chipotle. The fish tacos are particularly good.
fan-freakin-tastic.  I agree with Tony F. Best Burrito in Austin.  I want one right now.

So glad I went to Cabo Bob s because the tortillas are so delicious. Burrito places usually all taste pretty similar to me but Cabo Bob s burritos have a distinct taste. I ve only tried the cilantro tortilla but I want to try the others next time I go. The burritos are so filling and the chicken is great and so are the beans and the prices are so fair  especially for what you re getting. Can t believe I went almost three years of living near it and never went. Also  they have Jarritos sodas which are my favorite. Don t forget to get a little punch card. I am 5 burritos away from getting a free burrito.
Fresh  quick  and delicious  The food puts Chipotle and Qdoba to shame. The tortilla is cooked when you order it  making it all the better. It s awesome

Tortillas made fresh while you watch  The food is fresh and tasty and they use quality ingredients. Love the brisket  amp  queso burrito and love that all the sodas are Dublin sodas made with real sugar.

This place is delicious and the staff is friendly. I work across the street  the only things that stops me from going more often is that I m embarrassed that I go so much already. Best burrito in the city hands down
One of the top burritos in Austin.   Fresh tortillas.  A good selection of ingredients that work well together.  Killer chips.  The only negative is that they only have hipster sodas on the fountain.

I recently visited Cabo Bob s in west campus two weeks ago and was an immediate fan  their  subway  style burrito taco bar is fresh and simple. I love this new addition of an Austin favorite to west campus. Student priced quality food that fills you up  Great staff  quick and efficient. Keep it up

I had read several reviews on Yelp and I was expecting a delicious burrito that represented SoCal. A burrito that taste better than Chipotle. Maybe my expectations were too high  but my fish burrito was just average. The taste of food was overall  blah.  I feel that the food lacked seasoning. However  the tortilla was delicious. I enjoyed watching them make and cook the tortilla. There was a lot of potential for this place. It had a nice atmosphere but ultimately it was just another burrito and I still prefer my chipotle.
Really good food at affordable rates. I use the Hooked app when I go and they always have great discounts on there. Their burritos are huge and their sauces are great.

went to Cabo Bobs restaurant on Rio Grande and had a very unpleasant experience. I LOVE Cabo Bobs and when my boyfriend and I needed to grab a bite it seemed like an obvious choice. We did realize that the restaurant was closing in 45 mins but because it is typically quick and we were taking our food to go  we figured this would be a non-issue. When we ordered our tortillas  I went first  the man making them was extremely rude. I understand that it was within an hour of closing which may make an employee upset so I gave him a little slack and continued with my burrito making process. I was out of earshot when my boyfriend ordered and we got our food and left. When we got in the car my boyfriend asked me what  pinche cabron  meant. Being from a border town I instantly knew that it loosely translated to  f   ing a  hole  and asked him why. It was then that I was informed that the man making tortillas said that to my boyfriend after he ordered. I ve worked in the food industry and I understand a little rudeness but that is completely unacceptable. We were in and out 45 minutes before closing time. I am shocked and offended that an employee would behave in such a manner and treat a grateful paying customer like that. The rest of the staff was great  super friendly  helpful  kind  personable etc. but this tortilla man needs to be reprimanded at the least if that is the way he is going to treat people.

I do appreciate the fresh tortillas. That being said  I did not like Cabo Bob s. I ordered the  2 fish taco meal  and it was very bland. My husband got a burrito with briskest and it was very dry. Probably won t be back.

There is one thing I ABSOLUTELY HATE about this place  and that is that it is not open on Sundays  I haven t been to another burrito place since my first time here  it s just not worth the time or the money anymore. You are very VERY generously served and the tortillas are something else.  The sauces  meats  toppings  are all perfect
cheap  pretty good burritos tacos with a fish option. they make their own tortillas. my greatest regret when I lost my wallet was losing the burrito punch card...just one punch away...nevermore

It is really rare when I give out 5 s but this place definitely deserves it. The environment is a unique experience and probably one of my favorite restaurant atmosphere I have seen. It really feels like I near a beach side. The music here is nice and soothing  and adds on more to the atmosphere. The food and price here is worth the value. The ingredients are fresh  and the beef fajita I had tasted authentic. Overall  this place beats the heck out of chipotle. The reason being is that the ingredients taste fresher  the size of the burrito is larger  and the have queso to add on too  Plus  they give many more scoops than chipotle. This place is definitely not stingy. Another reason why this place is exceptional is their customer service. They were super friendly and let us try samples. I loved the customer interaction... Chipotle definitely doesn t have this. If I had a choice to pick Cabo Bob s  Chipotle  or Qdoba  I would pick Cabo Bob s all day everyday. Keep up the work

I never write reviews of any restaurants because there just aren t that many which are completely notable. So here goes.... If you eat at Cabo Bob s  you will judge the remainder of your life as B.C. and A.C.--before Cabo s and after Cabo s. The tortillas are hand-pressed on the spot and far outshine any that I ve ever eaten. Think  Mi Tierra  in San Antonio  this place is incredible  I had ancho chili with chicken and creamy chipotle sauce  it was the best burrito I ve ever eaten. Chipotle and Freebirds do not compare. Do yourself a favor and go eat one
Better than Freebirds  the tortillas are made fresh in house and not pulled out of a wrapper. Brisket and queso is amazing  fish tacos are great  its just all fantastic
Great food  quick and good service. The only knock is they aren t open on Sundays.

Really  really good. We are big fans of all the other burrito places too  but this one is worth writing a review for. The flavor is different. I ate an entire burrito in one sitting  something I normally have the will power not to do   love the option to add veggies  everything was fresh  we will be going again and again

I would have given 5 stars buts they seems to have a problem cooking rice. I v been there twice and both times the rice was soooo undercooked. Like hard and crunchy...not just a little chewy. I never ate at the one south so I don t know if this is just how it is with them. There were 6 of us and all felt the same about the rice. May try again. But no rice
I LOVE cabo bob s  I love the guac and queso and their chips yumm. Cabo Bob s will always get a 5 star from me
